73b5(rgyud 'grel): bya btab pas/ gtso bo'i yum las bdag med ma gcig chad nas byung ste/ rang he badz+ra la 'khyud nas bsrub pa'i sbyor ba byas pas lus la zag med kyi bde ba chen po skyes po ni shes rab ye shes kyi dbang ngo // de nas spyi bo'i lha
73b6(rgyud 'grel): tshogs la mchod pas lha gdan dang bcas pa spyi bor thim nas/ lha sku mnga' bas gsal ba'i gsal stong 'dzin med bde ba chen po la mnyam par bzhag/ mdor na snang srid 'khor 'das kyis bsdus pa'i chos
74a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi ngo bo rnam par dag pa skyes pa thams cad dang bral ba/ rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyag rgya chen po 'ba' zhig la bzhag par bya'o// de ni dpung bzhi pa'o// de nas ya r+ya ka/ a
74a2(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba'i nang du sna tshogs rdzas rnams sha lnga bdud rtsi lngar legs par sbyangs nas/ lha tshogs rnams mchod cing / rnal 'byor pa rnams rol par bya'o// gtor ma lnga ni gong bzhin sbyangs la 'byung po thams
74a3(rgyud 'grel): cad po'i sngags kyis bla ma dang / dgyes mdzad dang / chos skyong dang / gzhi bdag dang / gnod byed rnams tshim par byas nas/ rdo rje'i glu blang / lha tshogs la mchod bstod dang bshags pa byas nas/ bdag
74a4(rgyud 'grel): gis sbyin sogs bgyis pa'i bsod nams kyis// bcom ldan dgyes mdzad rdo rje mnyes byas te// pha rol phyin drug yongs su rdzogs byas nas// 'gro kun rdo rje rgyal po thob par shog/ ces pa bsngo ba bya'o//
74a5(rgyud 'grel): de nas rdo rje slob dpon dang thams cad mgrin gcig tu smon lam gdab pa ni// rigasu skye dang dam tshig can// mnyam med kye'i rdo rje ston// bla mA la gus snying rjer ldan// skye zhing skye bar 'gyur bar shog/ la
74a6(rgyud 'grel): pa rdo rje dril bu 'khrol// zab mo'i chos ni klog pa dang / btsun mo'i zhu ba mnyam za zhing // skye zhing skye bar 'gyur bar shog/ ces brjod de/ de nas dkyil 'khor la bskor ba bya zhing bzod gsol bya/ bkra shis brjod/ ya
74b1(rgyud 'grel): shes pa gshegs/ dam tshig pa spyi bor bsdu/ rdo rje slob dpon gyis mnyes par bya'o// dpal dgyes mdzad rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i cho ga mdor bsdus pa ye shes kyi mkha' gro ma ni gu mas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
74b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje ye shes mkha 'gro ma de nyid dang / lo tsa ba glen dang ma blo gros kyos bsgyur ba'o// // rgya gar skad du/ he badz+ra Sho Da sa b+hu dzi sA d+ha nA~M/ bod skad du/ brtse ba'i rdo rje phyag bcu drug pa'i
74b3(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa'i thabs/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal// rdo rje mkha' gro la phyag 'tshalo// gang zhig goms pa'i ro myong ba// rtsam gyis dngos por 'dzin pa 'di// ring du spong zhing yon tan rnams//
74b4(rgyud 'grel): 'od g+hur he ru ka de 'dud// tho rangs mai lA nas langasau la/ snying gar raM les byung ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bltas la/ de'i 'od kyis bdag nyid dri ma med par byas nas/ oM rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ zhes ldan
74b5(rgyud 'grel): gsum brjod nas/ gnas dang / bdag nyid dang / rnal 'byor srung ba byas la/ bsam gtan gyi khang par zhugs nas/ stan bde ba la 'dug ste/ oM badz+ra re khe hri zhes bya bas maN+Dal byas la/ oM badz+ra mi di ni badz+ra b+ha
74b6(rgyud 'grel): ba badz+ra ban+d+ha hUM zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs pa'i dkyil du/ oM AHhUM zhes bya ba brjod nas me tog gzhag par bya'o// shar du ni gaM gau rA na maHzhes bya bas so// lhor nai tsi tsau rI na maHzhes bya bas so// nub tu baM bet+tA lI
75a1(rgyud 'grel): na maHzhes bya bas so// byang du ni g+haM b+hasma rI na maHzhes bya bas so// dbang ldan du ni paM puk+ka sI na maHzhes bya bas so// me'i mtshamasu shaM sha ba rI na maHzhes bya byas so// bden bral du ni tsi tsAN+Da lI na maHzhes
75a2(rgyud 'grel): bya bas so// rlung mtshams su ni DaM DI bi na maHzhes bya bas so// oM de ba pi tsu badz+rA hUM hU~M hUM phaT swA hA/ zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par mchod la/ bdag med ma la yang / oM a A i I u U r-i r-I l-i l-I/ e I o
75a3(rgyud 'grel): AM aM swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis mchod do// yang bcom ldan 'das la/ oM auSh+To nA nA yai na maHoM bid+d+hi ur+t+ta ke sha ban+ta mA ni nA maHaM tsa tur+thi sha ti ne twA ya na maHoM Sh+To Da sha b+hU dz+nyA ya nA maHoM kr-iSh+Ta dz+nyi mU tA waM pu She na maHaM ka pA la
75a4(rgyud 'grel): mA lA a ne ka d+ha ri Ne na maHoM Ad+g+ha ta krU ra tsit+taM ya na maHar+d+han+na daMSh+Ti Ne ni na maHzhes bya ba'i tshig brgyad kyis mchod par bya ste/ oM badz+ra puSh+pe A hUM/ oM badz+ra d+hU pe AHhUM/ oM badz+ra gan+d+he AHhUM/ oM badz+ra nai be d+ye AHhUM/ zhes bya bas
75a5(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlabs pa'i me tog la sogs pa phul la/ lan gsum gyi bar du skyabs gsum gyi tshigasu bcad pa brjod do// yang mchod pa byas nas phyag btsa la la/ gtor ma byin nas badz+ra muHzhes bya bas gshegasu gsol bar
75a6(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// de'i rjes la sems can thams cad lha'i bde ba la dgod par 'dod pa'i byams pa dang / sdug bsngal thams cad bsal bar 'dod pa'i snying rje dang / lha'i bde ba rgyun mi 'chad par nges par 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang / bla na med
75b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lam la nye bar dgod par 'dod pa'i btang snyoms bsgoms par bya'o// yang yid kyis chos thams cad la dmigs nas dpyad na stong pa 'od gsal ba'i ngo bor bltas la/ oM shU n+ya ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ka ha/ zhes bya ba 'das bya/
75b2(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlab par bya'o// de ma thag tu raM las byung ba'i nyi ma la aM dang hUM bltas la/ de'i 'od kyis dpag tu med cing mtha' yas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pa'i sems can rnams yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod
75b3(rgyud 'grel): nas/ yi ge gnyis po de nyid du yang dag par bsdus nas zhugs par bsams pas/ yud tsam gyis yongasasu rdzogs par bcom ldan 'das ma dang bcas pa'i bcom ldan 'das phyag bcu drug pa/ zhal brgyad pa/ phyag rgya lnga
75b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa/ zhabs bzhis gshegs pa bdud bzhi'i snying gar skyil krung phyed pa gar gyis mnan pa/ mgo bo'i phreng ba 'phyang ba/ 'jig pa'i dus kyi sprin sngon po'i mdog gi lus can khro ba dang bcas pa/ dbu skra dmar ser gyen du 'bar
75b5(rgyud 'grel): ba/ spyan nyi shu rtsa bzhi mnga' ba/ phyag bcu drug na bsnams pa'i thod pa/ g.yas kyi rnams na glang po che dang / rta dang / bong bu dang / glang dang / rnga mo dang / mI dang / sha ra ba dang / byi la rnams gnas pa'o// g.yon pa'i
75b6(rgyud 'grel): brgyad no/ sa dang chu dang / rlung dang / me dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / gshin rje dang / nor sbyin rnams 'dzin pa'o// spyi bor sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin pa/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal 'phrog pa/ gri gug dang thong pa bsnams pa'i bdag med
76a1(rgyud 'grel): mas 'khyud pa'i bdag nyid can bsgom par bya'o// de'i rjes snying gar nyi ma la hUM bltas la/ bdag med ma'i snying gar yang zla ba la yi ge aM blta zhing spyi bor ni yi ge A~M mo// mgrin par ni A'o// snying gar yi
76a2(rgyud 'grel): ga hUM bkod la/ mig la gti mug rdo rje ma/ rna ba la zhe sdang rdo rje ma/ sna la ser sna rdo rje ma/ kha la 'dod chags rdo rje ma// lus la phrag dog rdo rje ma/ yid la bdag med ma bkod la/ snying ga'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas rnams spyan
76a3(rgyud 'grel): drangs nas/ oM a b+hi shiny+tsi tu mAM sarba ta thA ga ta zhes bya bas dbang bskur bar gsol ba gdab par bya'o// de nas sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur bas/ me tog dang / gur gum gyi cher yang dbab par bsam/ lha mo
76a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis kyang bdag nyid la bstod pa bsgom par bya'o// bsgoms pas dub par gyur na yang sngags bzlas par byA ste/ oM dA wa pi tsu badz+ra hUM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ zhes bya'o// langs pa'i dusu lho mo rang gi snying ka'i sa bon gyi nang du
76a5(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms la/ lha'i gzugs kyis gnas par bya'o// bsgom pa'i dang por yang gtor ma sbyin par bya'o// de'i rim po ni 'di yin te/ yi las rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsams la/ de'i steng du raM las me'i dkyil 'khor ro// de'i
76a6(rgyud 'grel): steng du a las thod pa'o// de'i steng du gau ku da ha naM/ ma ra mu su bi/ zhes bya ba'i rdzas rnams oM gyis byin gyis brlabs la bsgoms nas/ steng du yi ge hUM yongasu gyur pa las rdo rje dkar po s+t+waM/ rdo rje dang pad+ma snyoms par zhugs pa
76b1(rgyud 'grel): lngas me 'bar bas tshos shing khu bar gyur pa de'i 'od kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzugs mthong ba las/ de dag gi thugs kyi sa bon gyi bdud rtsi bsdus nas/ der chud par byas nas/ oM AHhUM zhes pa'i snga Da
76b2(rgyud 'grel): kyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o// 'di lta bu ni gtor ma la sogs pa'i rdzas dag par bya ba'i cho ga'o// nam mkha' las chos 'byung gi nang du pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa'i lte bya la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo
76b3(rgyud 'grel): 'am/ dpa' bo gcig pu 'am/ phyogs kyi 'dab ma la dbang po la sogs pa rang rang gi rig mas mgul nas 'khyud pa/ zhabs g.yon brkyang bas gnas pa/ kha dog nag po mi bskyod pa'i cod pan can/ rdo rje dang dril
76b4(rgyud 'grel): bu bsnams pa bltas la/ de'i steng du tshangs pa de bzhin du kha dog dkar po/ rnam par snang mdzad cod pan du 'dzin par blta bar bya'o// 'og tu sa 'og na gnas bya'i klu la sogs pa rnams la/ kha dog dmar
76b5(rgyud 'grel): po snang ba mtha' yas kyi cod pan byas la blta bar bya'o// thams cad kyi lce pad+ma'i 'dab ma la hUM las rdo rje dkar por bsgoms la/ snying ga'i sa bon las byung ba'i gau ri la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyis yongasu dag
76b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bdud rtsis dgang bar bya'o// de'i sngags ni 'di yin te/ in+da dza ma dzi la dzak+Sha b+hU ti bah+ni ba yu rak+Sha tsan+da sA d+d+haM ma ta bap+pa tA la pa tA la aT+Ta saMp+pa swA hA/ i daM ba liM b+huM dza dzi g+ha pul+la d+hU pa mAM sa be g+ha am+b+ha sarba kAdz+dza sA d+ha ShAn+ti
77a1(rgyud 'grel): ThA Ni pi D+hA b+hud/ ai ak+ShA ro mu khyA swArbad+harmA NAM Ad+ham+man+mA t+yA yaM ar+d+had+b+ha Ta swAhA/ nas lan gsum brjod nas/ bsnang gtoR+Sha smin par byAstA/ e ng+guHbi shur+d+ha d+hAr+thA/ sarba b+hA ba ba nad+d+ha
77a2(rgyud 'grel): ya sarba bi kral+lA pa na ya hUM/ zhes bya ba'i sngags so// yid kyis mchod pa byas la/ oM badz+ra muHzhes bya ba 'dis gshegasu gsol// zas kyi dus su yang de bzhin du zas kyi rdzas rnams sbyar nas/
77a3(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid kyi lce la hUM las rdo rje dkar por byas la/ snying gar bcom ldan 'das bltas la de nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdus nas/ ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i sa bon las byung ba'i
77a4(rgyud 'grel): mes/ kha zas kyi rdzas rnams sbrengs shing sbyin sreg byeng do// chags pa'i dus su yang shes rab ma bdag med ma'i gzugasu mos pa byas nas/ de'i mgo bo la oM snying gar hUM/ pad+ma'i lte ba la AHbsams nas//
77a5(rgyud 'grel): oM pad+ma su khA d+ha ra ma hA ra ga su khaM dat+ta tsa tu rA nan+da b+ha ga bi shwa hUM hUM hUM kar+yaM ku ru Sh+Ta me zhes bya ba 'dis pad+ma byin gyi sra brlabasA lA/ bdag nyid la yi ge gsum bkod la/ hUM laMs rdo rje bsgom nas/ a~M las de'i
77a6(rgyud 'grel): nor bu'o// oM badz+ra ma hA dwe Sha tsi tu rA nan+da da ya ka kha ga mu khe oM kau r-I sau nA tha hU~M hUM kar+yaM ku ru ShA me/ zhes bya ba 'dis rdo rje byin gyis brlabs nas/ sI sAM sAM/ ha ha ha/ zhes bya bas chags pa brtsam par bya'o//
77b1(rgyud 'grel): bla ma'i man ngag gis skad cig ma mtshon par byas nus/ rdzogs pa dang bdud rtsi de bdud rtsi len gyis blangs la bdag nyid tshim par bya'o// nyal ba'i dus ldan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin du sna tshogs 'dis mos par
77b2(rgyud 'grel): byas la gnyid log par bya'o// byis b+ha rnams kyis rtogs bya'i phyir// ston pa mgon po zhal brgyad pa'i// bdag gi sgrub thabs byos pa des/ 'gro kun rdo rje 'dzin gyur cig/ dpal dgyes pa rdo rje phyug bcu drug
77b3(rgyud 'grel): po'i sgrub thabs/ paN+Di taM s+thA tsar+ya kr-iSh+Na'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// rgyu gar skad du/ shrI he badz+ra ba lI kra ma/ bod skad du/ dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i gauter
77b4(rgyud 'grel): ma'i rimo pa/ dpal ngag gri dbang phyug la phyag 'tshalo// thibs dang shes rab bdag nyid can// yi ge gnyis las yang dag byung // sku gsung thugs kyi dbang phyug gtso/ he ru kra la phyag 'tshal te// sku gsung
77b5(rgyud 'grel): thugs kyi dbye ldan pa'i// dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la// bdud rtsi gtor ma dbul ba yi// cho ga'i thabs kyi rim pa bshad// de la gtor ma'i dgos pa ni/ dpal kye'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dang / sbyin sreg dang
77b6(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa dang / sgrub pa'i dus su rnal 'byor pas phan gdags pa dang / tshar gcad pa dang / rigs kyi bu dag tshe ring bar 'dod pa dang / yams dang nad med par 'dod pa dang / mu ge zhi bar 'dod pa dang / gnod pa zhi bor 'dod pa dang
78a1(rgyud 'grel): dpal dang grags pa 'phel bar bdod pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba bzlog par 'dod pa dang / longs spyod dang 'byor pa 'dod pa dang / phas kyi rgol ba bzlog par 'dod pa dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten
78a2(rgyud 'grel): las 'das pa'i dngos grub thob par 'dod pa mkhas pas gtor ma'i las la brtson par bya'o// de yang gang zhig ce na gzhung las/ bgegs rnams zhi bar bya ba dang lha rnams 'go bar bya ba dang / dam tshig nyams pa bskang ba
78a3(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ gtor ma'i las 'di ci nus brtsam/ zhes 'byung ngo // yang kha cig las/ 'byung po kun la gtor ma 'di dag gis// rnal 'byor pa yis mchod pa legs byas nas// dus kun rnyed pas bde bar 'gyur ba dang /
78a4(rgyud 'grel): lho rnams dga' zhing 'gro ba 'byor par 'gyur// 'byung po'i tshigs la gtor ma gcig byin na// snang dang mngon spyod dgra yi sde 'joms shing // dgur dang bsnyad dang dgug par byed pa dang // zhi zhing bad+ma dang rgyas par byed
78a5(rgyud 'grel): pa yin/ zhes 'byung ngo // yang slob dpon kha cig gis/ 'jig rten 'jig rten las 'das pa'i// dngos grub cho ga thams cad la// dpal ldan rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// gtor ma'i las 'di shin tu bsdu Da
78a6(rgyud 'grel): shes 'byung bas/ gtor ma'i las 'di shin tu phan yon che'o// de la 'dir ni sngags pas 'byung po nyi shu rtsa bzhi la gtor ma sbyin dgos te/ lha chen brgyad po 'khor dang bcas// klu chen brgyad dang phyogs skyong brgyad//
78b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor du gtogs pa'i brgyad po rnams// rang rang 'khor dang bcas rnams la// rgyun du khaM ni zla ba 'am// de bzhin lo cig rgyun 'khor ram// zla ba yar ngo'i tshes bcu dang // mar ngo yi ni tshes bcu la// dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg
78b2(rgyud 'grel): bzlas pa dang // de bzhin gnod byung dus dag gam// ji ltar 'os shing rigs pa dang // rlung gi ji ltar rjes mthun par// ci 'byor pa yi yo byad kyis// nan tan du ni gtor ma sbyin/ zhes 'byung ngo // de la gtor mi'i
78b3(rgyud 'grel): g.yos kyang ji ltar zhe na// me tog bdug spos mar me byug pa dang // sman rnams dang na dri dang lha ba shos dang // tshong ma dag dang la du khur ba dang // zun dron dang ni drug cu par bcas dang // phye sogs byas pa bsres
78b4(rgyud 'grel): nas ni// 'bras can 'bras kyi phyi nang 'bru bdun dang // zho dang 'bru mar 'o thug sogs pa bsre// khrag dang sha dang sran ma nya sha sogs// sbyar chang 'bru chang sna tshogs chan la sogs// btsos dang rjeno dang snying dang bcas pa rnams//
78b5(rgyud 'grel): ji bzhin bdud rtsi lnga dang bsres byas nas// de dag kun gyis snod rnams bkang nasu// bum pa chus bkang ba yi steng du bzhag/ khur ba zon du mar me steng du gtam// mtshan mo'i dus su de dag la yang dbul// zhes 'byung //
78b6(rgyud 'grel): bas/ drag po la ni dgra bo'i gzugs brnyan steng du bzhag/ gter ma kha dog las kyis bsgyur// de nas gtor ma byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa ni/ de dang por bdag nyid lha'i sku phyag rgya chen por gsal bA ba sgon/ ga
79a1(rgyud 'grel): nam 'alta bu la/ yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor yaM gis mtshan pa/ raM las me'i dkyil 'khor raM gyis mtshan pa/ de'i steng du A las thong ba/ nga'i nang du nyi ma'i stang du r+thA Tu ma d+hu kha dang gaM kun+na da ha na ltas/
79a2(rgyud 'grel): kyu lnga dang / bdud rtsi lngar bskyed do// de'i steng du hUM las rdo rje a las zla ba la phyed nub pa'o// de'i steng du oM gyis ye shes kyi bdud rtsi spyan drangs/ aHsa gzi byin bsgreng / hUM gis ye shes kyi bdud rtsi dang / dam
79a3(rgyud 'grel): tshig gi bdud rtsi gnyisu med par bya'o// de ltar byin gyis brlabs nas mdun du gru gsum chos 'byung nang du pad+ma sum rtseg bsam ste/ dngo bo pad+ma dkar po'i dbusu dgyes pa'i rdo rje dkar po'i dbusu dgyes pa'i rdo rje dkar
79a4(rgyud 'grel): po las lha brgyad oM las bskyed pos bskor// bar du pad+ma sngon po'i dbus su dgyes pa'i rdo rje sngon po la hUM las bskyed pa'i phyogs skyong bcu sngon pos bskor/ 'og tu pad+ma dmar po'i dbusu dgyes pa'i rdo rje dmar po la
79a5(rgyud 'grel): a las bskyed pa'i klu chen po brgyad kyis bskor ro// mgrin spyan drang ba'i phyir rdo n+d+he pad+ma'i phyog rgyu bcings te/ oM e a ra li hiMHhU~M dza~M hriM dziHhUM ba~M ha~MHbadz+ra nA kA~M nI/ badz+ra dr-i sh+ya hoH/ badz+ra sa ma ya ha~M/
79a6(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ pho gsum brjod pa dang bcas pa las/ snying ga'i sa bon 'od zer gyis bkug la/ oM AHhUM lha brgyad 'khor dang bcas pa dang // phyogs skyong brgyad dang klu chen brgyad// bka' bzhin 'khor
79b1(rgyud 'grel): du gtogs pa rnams// dam tshig dgod stu te gnas 'dir gshegs// gzhan yang gru gsum khongs gtogs pa'i// zhing skyod tshogs la 'di lta ste// oM shing gcig dang ni dur khrod dang // ri bo dang ni ri sul phug/ grong dang
79b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi mdo zhing dang ni// khyad par du ni khang stong dang // gdol pa'i snod dang thang dang ni// khyad par du ni mtshe la gnas// ma mo yau ni gnas rnams nas// nag po drag po drag chen po// lha byin mnyam du bsten pa dang // nag po
79b3(rgyud 'grel): gtsigs dang mi sdug dang // dga' las 'das dang log 'dren rnams// rgan byad mo dang drag mo dang // brjed byed ma dang u ma dang // rgyal dang rnam par rgyal ba dang // mi thub grananaM gyis mi thub ma// nag mo bzang
79b4(rgyud 'grel): mo nag chen mo// nag sdom ma dang rnal 'byor ma// dbang mo dang ni zla ba mo// drug mo sdang mo 'chang ba mo// 'o phrog byed mA dang mar ma mo// sum cu ma dang dbang mo dang // 'jigs byed grong gnas rnal 'byor ma//
79b5(rgyud 'grel): drag mo'i gzugs dang gzugs chen mo// mche ba gtsigs dang thong chen ma// tha~Md phreng phreng chen kha T+wAM ma// sbrul chen rol gri dgra sta can// rdo rje de bzhin gzhu chen me// de bzhin chen mo mkha'agro lnga// de bzhin rdo rje dbang phyug
79b6(rgyud 'grel): gtso// las kun rje su sgrub byed ma// sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyal chen mo// de bzhin rdo rje dbang phyug gtso// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen te// rdul med rnal 'byor 'byin pa mo// rdo rje dbang mo'i bka' 'di yis// thams
80a1(rgyud 'grel): cad ma lus 'dir 'dus shig/ oM kak+ShA d+ha na/ ba b+han+d+ha na/ kha khyA d+hA na sarba duSh+TA naM ha na ha nA/ g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ he badz+ra maN+Da lA sa pA ri wA re b+h+yo A kAR+Sha ya hUMhrIHbres pas bkug la pad+ma'i gdan la
80a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs par bsnams la// de nas mchod pas mchod de// oM ku ru ku ru A d+hi pa tiSh+Tha sa mA yaM hUM dzaHgnyis med par bya'o// de nas dam tshig gi lha la b+him bu'i rjes+ye/ lce pad+ma'i steng du hUM lus rdo rje ri byin gyi brlab
80a3(rgyud 'grel): bo// de nas pad+maSh+Ti lag pa khyA phye ste/ gtor mA la gtad nAs gtor ma 'bul ba'i sngags brjod do// oM Ut+mahUMHhoHbadz+ro b+hai ra bA ya/ badz+ra b+haM bi yA/ dzo glA dzo gi ni/ sarba lo kai ka li kot+ta ra/ sarbo nA ka TA ki
80a4(rgyud 'grel): nISh+Ta b+h+yo/ badz+ra gau rI/ badz+dza tsau r-I/ badz+ra bed+d+hA lI/ badz+ra g+hAsma rI/ badz+ra puk+tha sI/ badz+ra sa ba rI/ badz+ra tsiN+Da l+lI/ badz+ra ShAM ba nI/ a ti kaM/ sa pa ri wA ri b+h+yo/ i d+h+waM ba lI/ gan+d+ha/ puSh+pA/ d+hU pa/ d+hI pa/ uk+Sha tAM/ da nga ma hi
80a5(rgyud 'grel): twe dzA/ a kas+t+ya/ sa pa ri wA re b+h+yo/ i daM ba li/ gr-ih+na na tu dzaHhUM baM hoSh+Ta/ saM trAp+ta/ sarba satra ni shin+tiM ku ru/ puSh+TiM ku ru/ rak+Sha taM ku ru/ a ba na ku ru/ gup+taM ka ro du/ kuR+YA n+do hU~M hUM phaT swA hA/ i dr-i be liM kha kha khA
80a6(rgyud 'grel): ha~MSh+ThaH/ ts+tshats+tshats+tsha/ rje dza dza~M dza/ badz+ra d+ha ro sadz+nyA pa ya~M ti swAhA// oM AHhU~M hoHsarba ba nA ga ya~Mk+Sha rak+Sha sa~M/ mna? Sha a ma nu Sha/ a su ro/ gan+d+har+b+ho/ g+hu b+hai ra g+ha~M Sh+T+r-I gau ru rad+h+ye te/ pre ta paM shA tsa/
80b1(rgyud 'grel): basmA ra/ u man+ta/ sarba lo ka kA lo kot+tA ra/ badz+ra DA ka DA ki ni sa pa ri wA ri b+h+yAM/ i maM sarba pU dza gan+d+ha/ puSh+pa d+hU pa dAM baM/ ne bits+tsha/ ak+Sha taM da da ma hi te tsaM/ a gad+d+ha sa pa rI bA re b+h+yaHi daM ba li br-ih+Nan+tu/ kha dan+tu/ bi ban+d+ha dzAHhA
80b2(rgyud 'grel): baM hoHsa ma ya rak+Shan+tu/ ma ma sed+d+him+me pra yats+tshan+tu/ ya the baM/ ya teSh+TA b+huny+dzi ho/ ma ti krA ma tha/ ma ma sarba kan+ta ya sat+kA khaM/ bi shud+d+ha ye sa ha ka ye ka/ b+ha ban+d+ha hUM hUM phaT/ badz+ra d+ha ro Adz+nyA pa ya ti/ oM in+di dza ma dz+wa laM dzak+Sha b+hU
80b3(rgyud 'grel): ta bad+d+hi ba u ra/ tsan+da sAd+d+hi ma ti lA bar+b+ba ti laM prA tA lA/ aT+Ta sarbe swed+h+waM/ i daM ba liM b+hUny+dza dzi b+h+yAM/ buSh+mA/ d+hU paM/ dzI bi mA sa am+b+ho kats+tsha sA d+hA khan+ti khu N+Di pi TaM bA daM/ ai a kA r-i mu khA saMr+b+ba d+harmANAM Ad+ya nut+man+ma twAta au AHhUM
80b4(rgyud 'grel): phaT swA hA// de nas tshigasu bcad pa 'dis yang bsngo ba ni oM lha chen brgyad po 'khor bcas dang // 'jig rten skyong ba 'khor bcas dang // klu chen brgyad po 'khor bcas dang // gnod sbyin tshogs rnams ma lus dang // srin
80b5(rgyud 'grel): bo'i tshogs rnams ma lus dang // 'byung po'i tshogs rnams ma lus dang // yi dgas tshogs rnams ma lus dang // shra za'i tshogs rnams ma lus dang // smyo byed tshogs rnams ma lus dang // brjed byed tshogs rnams
80b6(rgyud 'grel): ma lus dang // mkha' gro'i tshogs rnams ma lus dang // de la sogs pa'i 'byung po'i tshogs// mi lus tshogs bcas ji snyed rnams// 'dir gshegs bdag la dgong su gsol// mchod sbyin gtor ma 'di snoms la// bdag ming
81a1(rgyud 'grel): 'di zhes bya ba la// nad med tshe dang dbang phyug dang // dpalnga dang grags dang skal pa bzang // longs spyod rgya chen kun thob cing // zhi dang rgyas la sogs pa yi// las kyi dngos grub bdag la stsol//
81a2(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig can gyis bdag la bsrung // dngos grub kun gyi gtong grogs mdzod// dus min 'chi dang nad rnams dang // gnod dang bgegs rnams zhi bar mdzod// rmi lam dran dang mtshan ma ngan// byad byed ngan pa zhi bar mdzod//
81a3(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten bde zhing lho legs dang // 'bru rnams rgyas shing 'phel bar mdzod// bde legs thams cad grub pa dang // yid la 'dod pa 'grub par shog/ mkha 'gro'i tshogs rnams ma lus kun// de la stsogs pa'i gnod
81a4(rgyud 'grel): sbyin tshogs// drag cing gtum pa'i 'byung po'i tshogs// ma rung sems can ming 'di long // dag cing snying rje med pa yi// rnal 'byor ma dang ma mo dang // mkha' gro gnod sbyin sha za dang // lto 'phye dang ni srin po dang /
81a5(rgyud 'grel): gzhan yang sha za khrag 'thung ba'i// khyi dang khra dang kaM ka dang // 'ol ba bya rgod la sogs pa'i// gzugs can thams cad 'dir gshegs shig/ bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba la// gnod par byed pa 'di zhes pa// chung
81a6(rgyud 'grel): ma nor dang srog dang ni// 'dod pa rnams ni 'phrog par mdzod// rang gi yul nas 'byung ba dang // dgar pa dang ni skud par gyis// bdag gi dpung ni stobs med la// dgra ni stobs ldan kho na ste// 'di nyid khyod kyis
81b1(rgyud 'grel): bza' ba'i phyir// sha dang khrag dang zhag dang rkang // bza' ba skom dang bcas pa mdzod// dgra lus gsol ba dgra madrangs phrogs// rang gi rnal 'byor ci rigs par// long la za ba nyid du gyis// thams cad tshim
81b2(rgyud 'grel): bar bzhesu gsol// gang gis bdag la mi tshugs shing // dgra 'di thams cad choms par mdzod// bdag la las kyi dngos grub ni// rgya chen yongasu sprul nas kyang // nyid kyi gnas dang yul du gshegs// ci
81b3(rgyud 'grel): nus 'byor pa'i mchod pa 'di bzhes la// bdag gi las 'di 'bras bu mchis par mdzod// pus mo lha nga sA la btsugs nas ni// thal mo sbyar nas khyod la gsol ba ni// btsun mo dang ni sras dong g.yog tu bcas//
81b4(rgyud 'grel): glasan cing 'dir gshegs bdag la bka' drin skyabs// bdag gi bsod nams stobs dang ni// de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin brlabs dang // gsang sngags rig sngags mthu dag dang // chos kyi dbyings kyi stobs
81b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi mthus// sems can rnams la phan gdagaso pas// don rnams yang dag bsam pa kun// sems can khams ni ma lus par// de dag thams cad ci rigs par// thogs pa med par 'byung gyur cig/ sngags
81b6(rgyud 'grel): pa gang zhig dgra bgegs tshar bcad par 'dod pa des/ gzugs gtor ma'i steng du bzhag la/ gnod sbyin ma la sogs pa mi gdug pa'i gzugs can/ pho nya grangs med pas zos 'thungs par bsam zhing / gtor
82a1(rgyud 'grel): ma bstab cing 'di skad las bcolo// oM ma lus zhing na bzhug pa'i rgyal ba dang // dpal chen khrag 'thung khro rgya lnga 'jigs byang tshogs// ye shes mkha' gro mkha'agro ma yi tshogs//
82a2(rgyud 'grel): dum can rgya mtsho ma lus dgongs su gsol// thugs rje chen pos 'gro ba'i don mdzad cing // gdul dka' drag po'i tshogs rnams 'dul ba'i phyir// sgyu mo lta bur cir yang ston mdzad pa// gtum chen rab rngam
82a3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs pa phyag 'tshal// snyigs me lnga ldan bstan pa 'jig dus 'dis// bdud dang mu stegs log par lta ba rnams// zhi ba'i las kyis 'dul bar mi 'gyur bas// cham rngam drag po'i phrin las myur du mdzod// rgyal ba'i
82a4(rgyud 'grel): spyan sngar khos blangs shing // bstan pA bsrung bar zhal bzhes pa// 'jigs byed chen po'i bka' bzhin du// shin tu gdugs pa 'dul mdzad pa'i// tshangs pa dbang phyug chen po dang // lha yi dbang po 'dod pa'i lha//
82a5(rgyud 'grel): khyob 'jug tshogs kyi bdag po dang // b+h+rUM gi rI ti'i gzhonu dang // dga' byed dbang phyag 'dod lha dang // nyi me zla ba gza' chen dang // smin drag la sogs khyung gi mgo/ mgyogs pa'i gshog pas gdengs ka byas//
82a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sgra yaM dam tshig can// dkar po rtag pa'i dbu rgyan can// zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis te// 'khor lo dang ni dril bu 'brel// rig mo dang ni mnyam du sbyor// 'jigs pa'i tshul gyis brkyang bskum gnas// phyag
82b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya drug gis lus la brgyan// dus mtha'i me chen klong dkyil na// hUM phaT pheM pheM 'jigs par sgrogs// steng gi lha tshogs bcas pa yi// nam mkha'i ro zhon khyod kyis ni// dam tshig phrin las dus la bab// hUM ha ru ka yi bkra
82b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du// in+d+ra ru ti rAk+ta dang // ye shes dam tshig bdud rtsi dang // sna tshogs gtor ma 'di long la// bdag cag rnal 'byor sgrub pa po// rdo rje slob dpon slob ma dang // rdo rje spun dang ming sring la// gnod par
82b3(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'i dgra bge gos ni// sngags rgyud ye shes sun 'byin cing // slob dpon smod cing spun la 'khu// byang chub sems spong ngam tshig nyams// zhi ba'i las kyis mi 'dul bas// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa
82b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams// rab tu drongs shig 'dir khug la// rdul dang thal ba bzhin du lhogs// mngon spyod phrin los dus la bab/ sha dang khrag dang rus pa gsol// rgyu ma glo snying nang grol drongs// sngon gyi dam las
82b5(rgyud 'grel): ma 'da' bar// bcol ba'i las rnams grub par mdzad// rgyal ba'i spyan sngar khas blangs shing // bstan pa bsrung bar zhal bAzhes pa// 'jigs byang chen po'i bka' bzhin du// shin tu gdug pa 'dul
82b6(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa'i// brgya byin gshin rje chu bdag dang / gnod sbyin dbang dag me yi ste// srin po rlung lha la sogs pa// srin po'i mgo can 'jigs pa'i gzugs// mgyogs pa'i gsheg pas gdengs ka byas/
83a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje thugs kyi dam tshig can// nag po mi bskyod dbu rgyan ldan// zhal gcig phyug ni gnyis pa ste// rdo rje dang ni dril brus bre la// rig ma dang ni mnyam du sbyor// 'jigs pa'i tshul
83a2(rgyud 'grel): gyis brkyang bskum gnas// phyag rgya drug gis lus la brgyan// dus mtho'i me tshon klong dkyil na// hUM phaT pheM pheM 'jigs pa raM sgrogs// bar gyi mi tshogs bcas pa yi// bar snang ro zhon khyod kyis ni// dam tshig
83a3(rgyud 'grel): phrin las dus lnga bab// hUM he ru ka yaM bka' bzhin du// in+ta ru ti rak+ta dang // ye shes dam tshig bdud rtsi dang // sna tshogs gtor ma 'di long la// bdag cag rnal 'byor sgrub pa po// rdo rje slob dpon slob ma dang /
83a4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje spun dang ming sring la// gnod par byed pa'i dgra bgegs ni// sngags rgyud ye shes sun 'byin cing // slob dpon smod cing spun la 'khu// byang chub sems spong ngamo che ga nyams// zhi ba'i las kyis mi
83a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dul bas// gdug cing sdang sems ljon pa rnams// rab tu rmongs shig 'dir khug la// rdul dang thal ba bzhin du lhogs// sngon spyad phrin las dus la bab// sha dang khrag dang rulnga pa rol// rgyu ma glo snying
83a6(rgyud 'grel): nang grol drongs// sngon gyi de ma las ma 'da' bar// bcol ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod// rgyal ba'i spyan sngar khas blangs shing // bstan pa bsrang bar zhal bzhes pa// 'jigs byed chen po'i bka'
83b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du// shin tu gdug pa 'dul mdzad pa// stobs rgyu dung skyong mtha' yas dang // nor rgyas bu dang 'jog po dang // rigs ldan pad+ma chen po dang // pad+ma la sogs chu srin mgo/ mgyogs pa'i gshog pas gdengs ka
83b2(rgyud 'grel): byas// rdo rje gsung gi dam tshags can// dmar po gar dbang dbu rgyan ldan// zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis te// pad+ma dang ni dril bus brel// rig ma dang ni mnyam du sbyor// 'jigs pa'i tshul gyis brkyang bskum gnas/
83b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya drug gis lus la brgyan// dus mtha'i me chen klong dkyil na// hUM phaT pheM pheM 'jigs par sgrogs// 'og gi klu tshogs bcas pa yi// sa 'og ro zhen khyod kyis ni// dam tshig thugs ngam dus la bab// hUM ha ru ka
83b4(rgyud 'grel): yi bkra' bzhin du// in+d+ra ru ti rak+ta dang // ye shes dam tshig bdud rtsi dang // sna tshogs gtor mo 'di long la// bdag cag rnal 'byor sgrub pa po// rdo rje slob dpon slob mar bcas// rdo rje spun dang ming srid la// gnod par
83b5(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'i dgra bgegs ni// sngags rgyud ye shes sun 'byin cing // slob dpon smod cing spyan la 'khu// byang chub sems spong dag tshig nyams// zhi ba'i las kyis mi 'dul bsdu// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams
83b6(rgyud 'grel): rab tu drongs shig 'dir khug le// rdul dang thal ba bzhin du lhogs// mngon spyod phrin las dus la 'ab// sha dang khrag dang rus pa rol// rgyu ma gro snying nang grol drongs// sngon gyi dam las ma 'da' bar// bcol ba'i la
84a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams grub par mdzod// rgyal ba'i spyan sbyar khas blangs shing // bstan pa bsrung bar zhal bzhes pa// 'jigs byed chen po'i bka' bzhin du// shin tu gdug pa 'dul mdzad ma// phyi rol du
84a2(rgyud 'grel): khrod 'jigs pa na// dpa' bo dpa' mo rnal 'byor tshogs// zhing skyong drag paM ro langs dang // ma mo mkha 'gro la sogs tshogs// sha za brjod byed srul po dang // nam gru ldogro 'dren la sogs pa// gnod sbyin sa bdag gtug
84a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'dre// la la srin po'i zhal can lnga// mi yi lus can 'jigs pa'i gzugs// la la stag gi mgo can la// mi yi lus can rngam pa'i gzugs// la la seng ge'i mgo can la// srin bu'i gzuT can shin tu khI/
84a4(rgyud 'grel): la la mkha' lding mgo can la// klu yi lus can 'jigs pa'i gzugs// de bzhin bya yi mgo can dang // gcan zan lus can sna tshogs rnams// la la khro zhing la la rngam// lA la zhi zhing la la gtum// la la 'gying zhing
84a5(rgyud 'grel): la la lding // la la sha za khrag 'thung brtson// lnga la khro gtum 'jigs pa'i gzugs// la la rab brtson khro gnyer can// la la bzhad gang ha ha sgrogs// la la 'brus bzhin tu ldir// la la rngam skad pheM pheM sgrogs
84a6(rgyud 'grel): la la ma/ kha' stong gar gyis 'gengs// la la rtsub cing la le gnag/ la la dkar zhing rnam par gsal// la la dmar zhing chags pa'i mdog/ la la sngo zhing sdang ba'i tshul// la la ser po dbyi khas mdog rgyas// le la
84b1(rgyud 'grel): khro gnyer smin bu rtsub// la la smin bu gyen du 'khyil// sku 'khyil na mkha'i dbyibasu khyab// zhal gdangs mche gtsigs khrag 'thung ba'i// ljags 'dril mche ba dmar po gtsigs// spyan gsum sdang mig khro gnyer can// rus pa'i
84b2(rgyud 'grel): gtsar phreng sbrul gyis brgyan// khrag zhag tshol gyis tshom bus brgyan// glang chen ko rlon rnam par bshal// stag gi pags pas sham thabs byas// na bza' mi yi pags blag gsol// la la rdo rje gtun shing dang // ral
84b3(rgyud 'grel): gri chu g+hi la sogs pa'i// lag na mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin// la la gar gyis phyag rgyas sbyor// phyi yi dkyil 'khor chen por 'dir// phyi rol 'byung po'i tshigs bcas rnams// sa stengs ro zhon thams cad kyi//
84b4(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig phrin las dus la bAb// hUM he ru ka yi bka' bzhin du// in+d+ra ru ti rak+ta dang // ye shes dam tshig bdud rtsi dang // sna tshogs gtor ma 'di long la// bdag cag rnal 'byor sgrub pa po// rdo rje slob dpon slob
84b5(rgyud 'grel): slob ma dang // rdo rje spun dang ming sring lo// gnod par byed pa'i dgra bgegs ni// sngags rgyud ye shes sun 'byin cing // slob dpon smod cing spun la 'khu// byang chub sems spang dam tshig nyams// zhi byi'i las kyis mi
84b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dul bas// gdug pa'i sdang sems ldan pa rnams// rab tu drongs shig 'dir khug la// rdul dang thal ba bzhin du lhogs// mngon spyod phrin las dus la bab// sha dang khrag dang rus la rol// rgyu ma glo snying nang grol drongs
85a1(rgyud 'grel): sngon gyi dam las ma 'da' bar// bcol ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod// de nas gsang ba'i lhas ban+ti byA// de nas rdo rje'i glu brjod// de nas chos bshad de// oM chos rnams gca
85a2(rgyud 'grel): brnyan lta bu ste// dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med// rgyu dang las la kun tu 'byung // de bzhin nyid la nges par skyes// badren pa 'dis ni dkyil 'khor du/ kun gyi dri ma med mthong shog/ sems can thams cad bang gyur
85a3(rgyud 'grel): cig/ gang gi lam nas 'gro ba der// sangs rgyas nyid dang phrad par shog/ de nas smon lam gdab pa nau// au shI la tsaN+Da na le pai taM a gad+d+ha na pra b+hA ra Na/ po taM ka ku su mi kA ra NaM bi ha ra taM/ bud+d+ha bi shra ya/ pu nra
85a4(rgyud 'grel): rA ga ma na ya muHoM badz+ra satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ badz+ra satwa twe no pA tiSh+Te/ dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha babA/ a nu rak+to me b+ha bA/ su po Sh+yo ma b+ha ba/ sarba sad+d+him+b+he pA yats+tsha/ sarba d+hArma suM ts+tsha me/ tsit+tA shra
85a5(rgyud 'grel): yaHku ru hUM/ ho ha ha ha hoHb+ha ga ban/ sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra mA maM muny+tsa/ badz+ra b+ha bi ma hA sa ma ya satwa UHde nas bkra shis brjod// oM khyod kyis sems tsan don kun mdzad// rjesu mthun pA'i dngos grub stsol/
85a6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang // slar yang byon par mdzodzad du gsol// ces pas rang bzhin gyi mgron gshegasu gsol// dam tshig gi mgron yi ge gsum du byas nas bdag go snying ga'i sa bon la bsdu'o//
85b1(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor pa yI ser sna dang // dbul ba'i dri ma sbyang ba dang // dngos grub myur du thob pa dang // 'gro rnams bkod par 'brel phyir byas// dge bas 'gro kun byang chub mchog/ rin chen gling du myur 'gro shog/ dpal/
85b2(rgyud 'grel): dgyes po rdo rje'i gtor mi'i cho ga'i rim pa/ slob dpon chen po a la la badz+ra sa mdzad pa rdzogs so// / paN+Di ta kas+thA pa ga thA ga ya d+ha ra dang // bod kyi lo tse bi gyi jo zla ba'i 'od zer
85b3(rgyud 'grel): gyis bsgyur ba'o// rgya gar skad du/ bA li karma kra ma nA ma/ bod skad du/ gtor ma'i lus kyi rim pa zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshalo// bla
85b4(rgyud 'grel): med dko rlon mchog gsum blo dang // de yi chos skyong srungs ma la// bzong gsol dron du 'dud pa dang // rgyu yi phyir kyang phyag 'tshalo// tshogs gnyis rdzogs par bya ba dang // snga ma'i lan tshogs bral ba dang //
85b5(rgyud 'grel): 'phral gyis bar chud nyir zhi'i phyir// gtor ma rgyun du btang bar bya// tshogs kyi 'khor lo chen po dang // phrin las rnam bzhi rtsom pa dang // dbang bskur chen po byed pa'i tshe// gtor ma'i rim pa 'di ltar
85b6(rgyud 'grel): bya// yo byad dang ni bca' thabs dang // dgong rim dang yang byin rla bos dang // dbul dang dbang bskur dgye ba bdun// las kyi rim pa mdor bsdus pa'o// sha dang bdud rtsi zas lnga dang // gzhan yang bza' btung
86a1(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs te// gro ga 'am ras sam shing shun la// mchod pa'i bye brag sna tshogs bya// mngar na sna tshogs pa yi rdzas// sdig pa mang cing gnod pa meng // yo byad ngam par 'di
86a2(rgyud 'grel): bshad do// gzhan yang gtor ma chen po ni// shin tu che ba'i snod dag tu// mchod pa'i bye brag kha zis kyis// khengs par bkang ba'i steng dag tu// A shwad+tha yi shing dag la// gru gsum phyag rgya byas te
86a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhag/ gru gsum rtse la mar me gsum// nyin mtshan rtag tu btang bar bya// de ru 'phan dang rgyal mtshan dang // gdugs dang phyag rgya sna tshogs gzhag/ de'i dbusu zan kham gsum// steng du ban+d+ha mtshan bzang
86a4(rgyud 'grel): ngag/ khrag chen dag gis gang bu bzhag/ gzhan yang mdzes pa'i snod dag tu// khengs par bkang ba'i steng dag tu// 'phan dang rgyal mtshan gdugs rnams gzugs// mar me gcig kyang rta ga tu ga tang // mkha'
86a5(rgyud 'grel): 'grem dang phyogs skyong ni// mdzes pa'i snod du rdzas rnams kyis// legs par bkang ste bzhag par bya// tshogs dang tshogs kyi rol pa yin// lhag ma dag la lhag ma bya// kun kyang gcan zan rjes bzhin nam//
86a6(rgyud 'grel): las kyi dbyibs dang sbyar bar bya// chang dang khrag dang chu yis sbyang // gtor tshan rtsa ba'i dbusu bzhag/ yang na byang shar mtsham su bzhag/ lhag ma lho yi phyog su'o// phyogs skyong shar te mkha'agro nub// shin
86b1(rgyud 'grel): tu lhag ma mdun nam byang // ya las rlung dang ro las me// a las snod kyi nang dag tu// oM las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam// de yI dbus dang phyogs mtshamasu// hUM bruM aM dz+r-i khaM/ na go ku da ha/ dri chu dri chen khrag
86b2(rgyud 'grel): dang ga byar shel// mau dang ba lang khyi gling rta// de yi steng du yig 'bru bsam// de las rigs lnga yabA yum bsam// de steng aM las zla ba ste// de steng hUM las rdo rje bsam// phaT kyi 'bud cing 'bar ba dang
86b3(rgyud 'grel): bsros te dros pas yab yum rol// byang chub sems kyi 'od zer gyis// phyogs bcu dag na gnas pa yi// bde gshegs ye shes byang chub sems// sems can rnams kyi bkrag gzi mdangs// rtsi shing nags tshal
86b4(rgyud 'grel): bcud bsdus te// slar yang ji bzhin dgug par bya// thim nas thams cad 'od du zhu/ oM AHhUM gis byin gyis brlab// las kyi stobs la bab pa dang // gtor chen ban+d+ha'i nang du ni// sgrub thabs gzhung bzhin
86b5(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms nas su// de yi phyir rim par khyams la// lha brgyad 'khor bcas mos pas bsgom// gnyis pa lo ni phyogs skyong dang // de bzhin gsum par klu chen brgyad// 'khor dang bcas pa mos paso// tshogs kyi rdzas
86b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams drangs pa la// bsang gtor byas te byin gyis brlab// phung bkros pad+ma'i phyag rgyas blang // sngags 'di brjod cing dbul bar bya// oM a h+ye badz+ra i da~M ba li khA hi/ lha rnams kun la de bzhin dbul// bsrung ba'i dbang
87a1(rgyud 'grel): sngags brjod cing dbul// bsdad cing rdo rje glu yang blang // de nas lhag ma'i phung bkros te// gru gsum zla ba'i steng dag tu// bdag nyid kyi yaM rdo rjer bsgom// nga yi khyams la ma 'gro ma// 'khor
87a2(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa mos pas bsam// gnyis pa la nI dbang phyug ma// gzhan yang 'gro ba ris drug dang // dmigs kyis yul gyi lha 'di rnams// lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcas nas// oM a h+ye hU~M/ sarba yo gi ni/ sarba DA kI
87a3(rgyud 'grel): ni/ brah+ma Ni ru tra ni/ ma he shwa ri/ beSh+Ta be/ pA rA hi/ na ya sing+ga/ a ya te/ ag+na ye/ ba ru Na ye ba ya baM ku ma ri ko be ra/ ga ru Ni/ pas+t+ra ki/ b+hi na ya ki/ b+he pa sa tri be b+he pra ma ni/ b+heska ri tsa muN+Da/ sarba de ba/ sai
87a4(rgyud 'grel): a su ra/ sarba ma nu Sha/ sarba tir ya ga/ sarba pre ta ga/ sarba nA ra ga/ sarba b+hU ta/ pI shwa tsa/ uSh+mAn+na a pasmA ra tA ya/ mos pa'i tshul du sbyin dang mchod// pad+ma'i phyag rgyas blangs la dbul// puSh+pA d+hA pa dI pa gan+d+ha/ naM bi
87a5(rgyud 'grel): d+ye/ pany+tsa a mr-i te/ ma tha/ dArtsa/ ba ta ga te/ tsa tra tsa ma ra/ sa yo tha ma tsa ma ra/ ma hA ra ka ta/ na na khI he/ saM pu ra naM/ i daM ba li b+hU tshi tha/ gr-ih+Na thA sa ma ya rak+Sha tha ma ma sarba a tha/ ha sa yaM/ ku ri thaH/ a tra/ sA d+ha
87a6(rgyud 'grel): naM/ yai shra tra sh+ma shaM/ rak+Sha sarbaM/ ar+thaM/ ya the baM/ ya thash+tse/ b+huM dzaH/ hUM hUM Ta phaT swA hA/ bi ba tha/ ma ti kra ma tha/ ma ma sarba sa pi ri/ sat+su khaM bi she d+ha na ye sAd+de/ ya ka b+ha bAn+tu/ oM AHhUM/ hU~M hUM phaT phaT swA hA/
87b1(rgyud 'grel): mo'i sgra dang rdo rje glu blangs te/ lhag ma'i'o gtor ma dbul bar bya'o// bdag nyid dgyes rdor rnal 'byor gyis/ chos 'byung nang du 'dab brgyad gsum// rim par dkar nag dmar ba'o// de yang yig 'bru gsum las
87b2(rgyud 'grel): bsgom// lha dang phyogs skyong klu chen brgyad// oM AHhUM los pad mdog bzhin// zhal gcig phyag gnyis rdor dril 'chang // rang gi yum yang de bzhin te// brkyang bskum tshul gyis kun kyang gnas// sa bon
87b3(rgyud 'grel): las ni 'od zer spro// gzugs dang gzugs med lha brgyad la// 'dod khams lha mi phyogs skyong ste// ngan song gsum dang lha ma yin// klu chen brgyad la bstim par bya// bdag gi thugs ka'i sa bon las
87b4(rgyud 'grel): phyag brgya bzhi yis sku gsung thugs// rang bzhin gnas nas spyan drang ste// phyi nang gsang bac+doMs mchod bya ste// lha dang phyogs skyong klu brgyad la// rnam snang mi bskyed mtha' yas kyis// rim pa ji bzhin
87b5(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskor bya// de laM sngagros 'dis rab tu dbul// pad+ma'i phyag+ma rgyu sa blangs nas su// oM in+d+ra ya myA dza~M la/ yak+ShaM dziHhU~M baM hob+hU te bidz+dzi/ bA yu/ r-Ik+Sha/ tsan+da/ suMd+d+hi mU ta bap+pa ta la/ pU tA la/ an+ta sap+pa/
87b6(rgyud 'grel): swA hA/ oM daM ba lid+d+hi dza/ dzi g+ha maM sa d+hU paM puSh+pe dI baM gan+d+hi/ wi g+ho e ba kats+tsha Shan+thi Ni pi Ta ga de/ oM a kA ro mu kha~M/ sarba d+harmA NAM/ Ad+ya nut+pan+naN+TetaM/ oM AHhUM swAhA// rdo rje glu dang rol mo'i sgra// mchod
88a1(rgyud 'grel): nyin mo lan gsum btang // yi dam lnga yi rnal 'byor gyis// mchod pa'i rdzas la bsang gtor brlab// 'dab brgyad dbus kyi lte ba la// mkha' gro 'khor bcas dmigs byas te//
88a2(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra DA ki ni/ si gi ni/ byA gi na/ dzaM bu gi ni/ lA ki naM/ DA ki ni/ dI pi no/ tsu b+h+r-i nau/ kaM bo dzi ni/ brjod pa tsam gyis dmigs byas te// 'deb brgyad la ni mkha'agro ma// gru chung la ni khams gsum gyi// gtso
88a3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad bsam par bya// khyams la 'khor rnams thams cang ngo // oM AHhUM/ kun kyang sku gsung thugs dang ldan// b+ha ga'i phyag rgya mgo steng bca'// aM A kA ro mu khaM sarba d+har+m+ma NaM/ Ad+h+ya nut+pan+na twAta/
88a4(rgyud 'grel): spyan drangs bstim lA ShA ro tshong bgegs// 'ong ba srung phyir 'di ska // aM na maHsa man+ta kA yA bAny+tsit+ta badz+ri naM/ na mo badz+ra kr-i d+ha ya/ ma hUM daMSh+Tot+ka Ta/ b+hai ra bA ya/ a si mu shU la parU pA sha tasta ya/ oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da
88a5(rgyud 'grel): l-i/ ga ga ShA hi khyA hi tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ ma tha ma tha/ gardza gardza/ s+pho Ta yAM s+pho Ta ya/ biM smr-i Da ya bi s+pho Ta yA/ sarba bag+h+na b+h+r-i nA ya nAM/ ma hA ka bI de/ bi bau tan+te kA rA yaM/ sarbaM go ri u pa Ta bA s+yA mo
88a6(rgyud 'grel): naM/ ku ru ku ru hUM hUM hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ de ltar bdud rtsis mtshams bcad nas// pad+ma'i phyag rgyas gtor ma dbul// ba liM ga tha/ oM A ra laM hoHdzaHhUM baM hoHbadz+ra DA ki na maHsa ma ya s+t+waM/ dr-i sh+ya hoHoM kha
88b1(rgyud 'grel): kha khA hi khA hi/ sarba b+hU ta/ pre tA rAk+ShA sa/ pi shA tsa uSh+man+da a pasma ra/ DA ki n+ye/ da ya/ i daM ba laM gr-ih+Nan+na/ sarba sid+d+him+me pra yats+tshan+ta/ sa ma ya rak+Shan+tu/ ya the baM/ ya theSh+TaM/ b+huny+dza tha/ pi ba thaHma ti kra ma tha/ ma ma surba
88b2(rgyud 'grel): pa ri pu ra ka/ ta ta su ka bi sho d+hA ye swAh+ma/ i a kra bi kr-i/ smA sha ne pa/ paR+ShA de/ kan+ta re/ g+hu hai gra me/ baR+YA daM/ baR+YA/ ba the/ khe dra/ sar+NaM ma ga ra/ bi se sa taM pA dzaM nau/ thaM lA ga te bu mo/ ma taM gA ti/ bI se
88b3(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ kr-iSh+Ta ru dz+nyA/ ma hA ru tA/ de ba trat+ta/ saM ma sret+ta/ kre na kaR+YA pi pa dzi/ nan+ta tI ta/ bi na ya ka/ tsa mur+t+ti/ go ru pi pa tsA/ u ma de bi tu/ sta pa dzA yaSh+Tu/ bi dza ya/ tsa bu ba/ a tsi to/ a pa ra tsi ta/ dzi ka li/
88b4(rgyud 'grel): kA ya b+ha bAn+na oM AHme hUM phaT swA hA// de ltar phul te gsol ba dang // se gol brdab cing gshegasu gsol// aM kre tau sArba sa tA ru thA/ si ti du ta ya thA nu gA ga dza ta/ pu taM bi sa ya/ pu na ra ga na ma ya
88b5(rgyud 'grel): du/ rang rang gan su yud tsam gyis// phyin te rnal 'byor bsgo ba nyan// de ltar mtshan mo lan gsum gtang // yi dam lha yi rnal 'byor gyis// lce la rdo rje bsgom byas te// lha 'am chos nyid rol bsams
88b6(rgyud 'grel): na// dngos grub rim par 'grub par 'gyur ro// rnal 'byor rol pa'i lhag ma la// shin tu lhag ma'i gtor ma bya// lte bar bdag nyid yi dam bsgom// pre ta brjod cing zur drug la// yi dgas thams cad bsdu
89a1(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// oM u tsi Ta a d+hi tiSh+Tha b+hu dza di bi tha hUM hUM phaT// sdug bsngal bral zhing tshim par bsam// sgrub pa'i zhag grangs thon pa dang // slob ma'i mgo steng gtor ma bzhag/ rtag tu
89a2(rgyud 'grel): srung zhing skyob pa dang // phrin lngas bzhi yi dbang thob pas maM// sum mdo'i ma lam ke'i bzhi mang 'am// dur khrod yang na chu 'gro ma du// nam byed nA ni gtor ma gtang // byung shar mtshamasu gtor tshan bskul//
89a3(rgyud 'grel): mdor na gnas pa'i go rims kyis// skul ba'i sa ru phyin pa dang // phyogs phyogs gdon rnams zil mnan phyir// phyogs bzhi dag tu kha bltas te// rdo rje gsor zhing dril bu dkrol// lag pa g.yon nas g.yosu
89a4(rgyud 'grel): bsgyur// rkang pa g.yon nas g.yas brdab// lag pa brkyang ste 'phyong zhing 'bur// long mo gshibs tau 'gying bodag gis// 'gyur zhing g.yon du dgrad cing blta// rang sngags gdon cing dgyes par bya'o//
89a5(rgyud 'grel): zla snang drug tu blang // rol mo'i sgra yang drug tu brdung // 'di ni mkhas pa rnams kyi gzhung // rgyud rnams dang ni 'gal ba med// gladams dag rim pa 'ang bris pas// lhag chad nor pa ci mchos
89a6(rgyud 'grel): pa// dkon mchog bla ma chos skyong dang / mkhas pa rnams la bzod par gsol// rmongs pa rnams la mig phyi bas// las kyi gzhung srongs dag rtsa gang // bdag dang rnal 'byor thams cad dang // sems
89b1(rgyud 'grel): can kun gyi don du bsngo// slob dpon chen po kha cha rin chen rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// @#rgya gar skad du/ sarba b+hU ta pA la bi d+hinA ma/ bod skad du/ 'a
89b2(rgyud 'grel): po thams cad kyi ga tor me'i tshi g+sa zhes bya ba/ dpal gyi'i rdo rje le phyug 'tshal lo// e baM rnam par nges bzhugs pa'i// rdo rje sems dpa' phyag bya ste// rnam 'ichi ldeg 'dren laM sogs dang / sems can bskyeng phyir gau tor
89b3(rgyud 'grel): ma brtsam// rnal 'byor pa yi bsgom bya ba// chos kyi 'byung gnas nang du ni// pad+ma 'dab brgyad gsum brtsegs la// dkar nag dmar po'i oM hUM Ar// rig par lha chen brgyad dang ni// phyogs bsrung brgyud dang klu
89b4(rgyud 'grel): chen brgyud// pad+ma'i 'od ba ltar bskyed bya ste// mdun du dbang phyug chen po bstod// g.yosu lha yi dbang po bsam// rgyab du chungs pa bskyed bya ste// g.yon gyi phyogasu khyab 'jug go/ me ru 'dod pa'i dbang phyug bskyed// srin
89b5(rgyud 'grel): por tshogs kyi bdag po ste/ ga~M da~M d+hi rlung mtsham so ste// dbang ldan marnams s+yA g+ni to ka/ mdun gyi 'dab mar brgya byin bsam// g.yas su mthar byeng dgod par bya'o// chu lha rgyab kyi 'dub ma yi'o// de
89b6(rgyud 'grel): g.yon du nor sbyin dgod// mi yi mtshams su me lhatshe// bden brel du ni srin po'o// rlung gi mchim su rlung lnga'o// dbang ldan mtsham su 'byung po'i bdog/ stobs kyi rgyu dang drung skyong dang // mtha' yas nor rgyas
90a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin te// 'jog po dang ni rigs ldan dang // pad chen shin tu pad chen po// thams cad zhal gcig phyag gnyis te// rdo rje dril bu phyag na 'chang // rang 'od rig mas yang dag 'khyud// gang na la
90a2(rgyud 'grel): g.yas brkyang ba yis bzhugs// rang rang thugs ka'i sa bon las// 'od zer lcags kyu ltar 'phros pas// lha chen brgyad la gzugs khams dang // gzugs med gnas pa'i lha bsdu'o// 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha dang mi// phyogs
90a3(rgyud 'grel): bsrung bcad la rab tu bsdu// ngan 'gro gsum dang lha ma yin// klu chen brgyad la bsdu bar bya// rang bzhin gnas la bzhugs pa yi// dkyil 'khor pa rnams spyan drang phyir// go rno yis ni dgug byas la// tsau ri yis ni
90a4(rgyud 'grel): ma pas bcings// bit+tA li yis lcags sgrog bsdam// dril bus mnyes byed g+hasma rI// rnal 'byor pa yi thugs ka nAs// 'od zer lcags kyu lta 'phros nas// phyogs bcu rgyal ba sras bcas kon// de la phyi nang gsang mchod
90a5(rgyud 'grel): nga rnams kyis ni dbang bskur mthar// rang rang bdag pos dbu la brgyan// lha chen brgyad le rtag pa yis// rdo rje yis ni phyogs skyong brgyad// gar dbang gis ni klu chen brgyad// de la cho gas gtor ma sgrub// rlung dang me yi dkyil
90a6(rgyud 'grel): las// AHlas byung ba'i pad snod bsam// der ni bruM AM dzI khaM hUM/ go ku da ha na las// sangs rgyas lnga dang sems can lnga// zla ba nyi mo'i bar du bsam// 'bar ba dang ni spros pa yis// 'chi med rab tu bsgrub par bya// cha yi rang bzhin
90b1(rgyud 'grel): 'di bsgom snar+tha/ oM AHhUM gis byin gyis brlabs la dbul// de nas gtor ma btang ba'i sngags// oM in+da dza ma dza la/ dzak+Sha b+hU ta bah+ni ba u rak+Sha tsan+da sUdz+nyA mA ma bap+pa ta la pA tA la A g+ha swA hA// de ni gtor ma'i mgro no// i daM ba laM/ bud+d+ha dza g+ha phumra/
90b2(rgyud 'grel): d+hU pa mAM sa bai g+ha/ de ni gsol bar zhu ba'o// am+b+ha sarba kAr+N+Na sA d+ha khan+ti khun+ti/ phe Ta ga da de ni don zhu ba'o// oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA Na A d+ha nut+pan+na tAM ta oM AHhUM phaT swA hA/ da ni byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngag so// de nas dgyes par byas nas ga
90b3(rgyud 'grel): su gsol/ yi ge brgya pa brjod par bya ste/ gtor ma 'di sbyin zhing rab tu mchod par byed na/ rnal 'byor pa las 'byung po thams cad kyis legs par byed par 'gyur ro// de tshe de la bde ba rnyeg pa med pa nyid dang / lha mnyes pa dang /
90b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor dge bar 'gyur ro// gal te 'byung po'i tshogs de la gtor ma byin na/ dbang dang mngon spyod dang dgra'i sde gzhig pa dang / bskrad pa dang dgog pa dang zhi ba dang bde ba dang rgyas par byed par 'gyur ro// 'byung po thams
90b5(rgyud 'grel): cad kyi gtor ma'i cho ga slob dpon nag po zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// / lo tsA ba shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos
90b6(rgyud 'grel): dpal thar pa gling gi gtsug lag khang chen por legs par bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o// /
91a1(rgyud 'grel): bya rdo rje'i sgrub thabs bzhugs/
91b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ he badz+ra sA d+ha ne bi ka/ bod skad du/ kye rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i thabs// dpal he ru ku la phyag 'tshalo// ye shes gnyis med rgyu dang bral// de bzhin tshogs bral gang mi gnas//
91b2(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan khrag 'thung phyag 'tshal te// dri bsten cho ga bstan par bya// gsang ba'i don ldan sgrub pa po// yang dag don ldan dam tshig dong // phyi nang gsang ba'i sdom pa shes// slob dpon gsang dang shes rab dang // de
91b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin bzhi pa'i dbang ljon pas// sgom pa'i mchog ni bsgrub par 'gyur// // shing gcig drung ngam dur khrod du// bsgom pa dag ni dge bar gsungs// yang na dben zhing dgon pa dang // ma
91b4(rgyud 'grel): mo'i gnas la sogs de bzhin// yang na bde zhing nyams dga' bar// rang gi 'dod pa bsgrub par bya// der ni bde zhing rgya che ba'i// stan la rnam par 'dug nas ni// me tog la sogs bye brag dang // bdud rtsi yi
91b5(rgyud 'grel): ni bsnang gtor bya// rdo rje mkha' snying dbus gnas par// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya// de la hUM yig 'byur ba yis// mtshon cha ma gA nI spro bAr bya// mkha' dbyings til gang bzhin rgyas pa'o//
91b6(rgyud 'grel): rang gi dkyil 'khor mchog bkug ste// rang snying sa bon mchog skyes pa'i// lha mo rnams kyis mchod par bya// gau rI zla ba'i mtshan ma dang // tsau rI nyi ma'i snod 'dzin te// bet+tA lI yi lag na chu'o// g+hasma rI ni sman
92a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin te// puk+ka sI ni rdo rje'o// sa pa rI ni de bzhin bcud// tsaN+Da lI ni rje chung 'khrol// Dom+bi chags chen rjes chags pas// snying gar yongasu 'khyud pa ste// 'di rnams kyis ni
92a2(rgyud 'grel): gtso bo mchod// de rjes bsod nams yan lag/ gsum gyi skyabs 'gro sogs bya ste// 'di ltar phyag 'tshal skyabs 'gro dang // sdig bshags bsod nams rjes yi rang // byang chub mchog tu sems
92a3(rgyud 'grel): bskyed dang // dam bca' bdag lus 'bul bar bya// de nas dang por byams pa ste// de rjes snying rje rnam par bsgom// gsum per dga' ba bsgom par bya// kun gyi tha mar btang snyomaso// de nas ya
92a4(rgyud 'grel): shes blta ba'i phyir// phyi dang nang gi dngos 'di kun// rnam dag stong par rnam dpyang // sprin med na mkha' ltar bsams nas// gsang sngags 'di ni brjod par bya// oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma kro/
92a5(rgyud 'grel): haM/ sems brtan byed de'o gseng sngags 'dis// stong pa nyid las sems kyi dngos// a ha aM dang ldan pa ni// a~M dbus haM gis 'brel pa las// ral nyi ma bdun bsams to// de le hU~M las byung ba yi/
92a6(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs rdo rje bsgom par bya// rdo rje des kyang ra ba dang // dra ba 'ching ba'ang bsgom par bya// de dbus mkha' dbyings bdag nyid kyis// shes rab e gzugs bsgom par bya// de steng sa dang chu dang ni//
92b1(rgyud 'grel): me dang rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnams// ljang gu dkar po dmar po dang // du ba'i mdog du bsam par bya// gru bzhi zlum po gru gsum dang // zla kham dbyib su rnam par bsam// de steng oM ldan a ha ni// bdag nyid pa
92b2(rgyud 'grel): gnas bsams te// e gzugs nas ni a he bar// thams cad 'dres par gyur 'khor lor 'gyur// gru bzhi pa la bsgo bzhi pa// kA ba brgyad kyis nye bar brgyan// dra ba dr-i phyed yang dag ldan// rdo rje thig gis
92b3(rgyud 'grel): yongs brgyan pa'o// de stengs chos dbyings bdag nyid kyi// rlo ni mkhas pas rab bsgoms te// de la A lI kA li las// 'byung ba nyi ma zla ba bsam// de dag rab tu sa bon ni// a dang ts+tshe las gyur pa yi//
92b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje gri gug bsgom par bya// de la rang sems bdag nyid kyi// a haM yongasu zhugs zhugs pa ni// dam pa'i dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyi// sems dpar 'dong brjod pa'o// de rnams gcig tu 'dres pa las/
92b5(rgyud 'grel): ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid kyi// he ru kAr ni rnam par bsgom// zla la mye lo ye shes twa// de bzhin nyi ma myanyam pa nyid// sa bon las byung mtshan mA ni// so sor rtog par gsungs pa'o// dbyer med
92b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dres pa na ne tan te// skur gyur chos dbyings ye shes yin// sku mdog sngo rang shar ba'i 'od// bin+du dmar po 'dra ba'i spyan// dbu skra kham bi gyen du 'khyil// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// 'khor lo snyan
93a1(rgyud 'grel): cha phyag gdub dang // mgur chu dang ni ske rags rnams// sangs rgyas lngar ni dag pa yis// 'di rnams phyag rgyar rab tu bsgrags// lo grangs bcu drug lta bu la// rab tu khros
93a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lta stangs can// g.yon na rdo rje thod pa dang // gnyis pa yum bya bdag nyid kyi// kha T+wAM gA yang 'khyud pa'o// g.yas na rdo rje nag po ste// hUM gi sgra 'byin bdag nyid can/ zhe sdang bdag nyid bsgom par bya// gal
93a3(rgyud 'grel): te phyag rgya byed 'dod na// g.yon gyi dang po ka pA la// lha dang lha min khrag gis bkang // g.yas kyi dang po rdo rje ste// lhag pa'i phyag gnyis ji lta bar// rang dang 'dra ba'i phyag mo 'khyud// gzhan yang sngon nyid ji lta
93a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'o// gzhan yang zhal gsum phyag drug ste// g.yas pa'i zhal ni skya reng 'dra// g.yon pa dmar po gtsar bu ste// g.yon gyi dang po tri shUl la// g.yas kyi dang po rdo rje'o// g.yon pa gnyis pa dril bu dang // g.ya
93a5(rgyud 'grel): pa gnyis pa ka ta ri// lhag mas rdo rje lu gu rgyud// gri dang thod pa bsnams pas 'khyud// gzhan ni sngo bzhin yum du bzhin// gzhan yang bsgom par bya ba ni// zhal brgyad pa la zhabs bzhi pa// bcu drug phyag
93a6(rgyud 'grel): gis rnam par brgyan// bdud bzhi zhabs kyis rnam par mnan// 'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs par byed// mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam brgyan cing // nyi ma la bzhugs gar gyis stabs// sna tshogs rdo rje spyi bor 'tshong
93b1(rgyud 'grel): kha dog nag po 'jigs par byed// rang zhal nas ni hUM 'phro zhing // sku la thal bas rnam par blugs// bdag med ma dang mnyam ldan pa'i// dga' ba'i sbyor ba snyoms par 'jug/ rnam par mi rtog bde ba yi// mi rtog rang bzhin
93b2(rgyud 'grel): bde bar gnas// dang po'i zhal ni nag po che// g.yas pa me tog kun du 'dra// dpa' bo g.yon pa dmar ba che// steng gi zhal ni rnam par gtsigs// nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i spyan dang ldan// lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba 'dra// g.yas
93b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'bar ba'i phyag brgyad na// pad+ma ban+d+ha brgyad nang du// glang po rta dang byang bu dang / ba lang rnga mo mi dag dang // byi la dang ni sing ge rnams// rim pa bzhin du shes par bya// sa dang chu dang rlung dang me// zla ba nyi ma de bzhin
93b4(rgyud 'grel): yang // gshin rje dang ni gnod sbyin rnams// g.yon gyi ban+d+ha brgyad du'o// sgegu dang dpa' dang mi sdug dang // rgo dro dang khro dang 'dzags par byed// snying rje ngo mtshar zhi la sogs// 'bar ba'i gor dragu nyams dang ldan// zhubs
93b5(rgyud 'grel): kyis sa la brtabs mdzad cing // lha mni lha la bsdigs mdzad pa'i// rang gi snying gar ra yig las// byung ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// de nas thabs dang shes rab kyi// ngo bo nyid kyi hU~M yig go/ rdo rje yi ge
93b6(rgyud 'grel): hUM las byung // kha dog nag po drag po che// rdo rje lte ba'i dbus gnas par// de nyid hUM du bsgom par bya// gzhan yang hUM yig yongs gyur pa'i// zhe sdang bdag nyid rnam par bsgom// rdo rje las byung nag po che// 'dam
94a1(rgyud 'grel): skyes sngon po rab 'dra ba'i// yang na sngo rangs shar ba 'dra// dad pas nges par bsgom par bya// de nas gzhal yas yid 'ong ba'i// ma mo'i 'khor lo bsgom bya ste// yab yum gnyis su
94a2(rgyud 'grel): med pa yi// yid 'ong sbyor bI dbyem pa / byung br-i gi nr-i ba pa byo// shar gyi sgor ni rnam par gnas// gnyisu med pa'i sbyor ba las// byung ba'i tsau rI yang spros te// lho phyogs sgo skyong tsau rI gnas// 'jam po 'jug pa sbyor ba las/
94a3(rgyud 'grel): bed+d+ha wI yang dbyung bar bya// spros nas bdud 'jams nub sgor ro// snyoms 'jug sbyor ba chen po las// g+hasma rI yang dbyung bar bya// spros nas byang gi sgo ru nau// khro bo gzugasu rnam par gnas// gnyis sprad
94a4(rgyud 'grel): pa yi sbyor ba yis// puMk+ka sI yang dbyung bar bya// spros nis dbang ldan gra ru nI// 'khrug pa'i gzugasu rnam par gnas// gzhan yang gnyis med sbyor ba las// shA ba rI ni me yaM g+ha// tsaN+Da lI ni srin po'i phyogs
94a5(rgyud 'grel): Dom+bi rlung gi grwa ru'o// gau ri g.yas na gI gug ste// g.yon pa na ni de bzhin nywa// tsI rI g.yas na rde chung ste// g.yon pa'i phyag na phag pa'o// bed+d+ha lI ga ya so ru sbal te// g.yon na pad+ma ban d+ha'o// g+hasma rI ni g.yas na sbrul//
94a6(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa na ni rnal 'byor snod// puk+ka sI g.yas seng ge ste// g.yon na de bzhin dgra sta'o// sa ba rI g.yas dge slong ste// g.yon na de bzhin bsag shang ngo // tsaN+Da lI g.yas 'khor lo ste// g.yen pa na ni de bzhin
94b1(rgyud 'grel): gshol// Dom+b+ha g.yas na rdo rje ste// g.yon na de bzhin sdigs mdzub bo// gau rI la sogs phyag gnyis gsungs// skyil krung phyed ma gar gyi stabs// spyan gsum sku ni gyen du brdzus// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan//
94b2(rgyud 'grel): gau rI sku mdog nag por 'gyur// tsau rI btsod drang 'dra bya sti// bait+tA lA ni gser btsoma?// g+hasma marka tA l+yA bu sti// puk+ka in+d+ri ni la 'dra// zla 'od lte bu sa ba rI/ tsaN+De lI ni ni mkha'i mdog/ Dom+bi sna tshogs dag du bshad//
94b3(rgyud 'grel): tshangs dang dbang po nye dbang po// drag po gshin rje gnod sbyin dang // bden bral na ni thags bzangs ris// gau rI la sogs lha mo yi// rim bzhin gdan du shes par bya// de rnams sa bon 'di yin no// gaM tsu paM g+haM pa
94b4(rgyud 'grel): s+yaM laM DaM// bdag pos sa bon 'di dag las// de rnams gdon pa nyid du bya// de nas rang gi rig ma dang // rdo rje 'dzin ma 'dod chags ches// 'od du zhu bar gyur pa laso// mtshams kyi lha mo bshes gnyen mos// sna
94b5(rgyud 'grel): tshogs glu yis mchod de bskul// kye yi rdo rje thugs rjes gzigs te prok+ka bdag la skyobs// bde ba chen po dang sbyar ba bdag 'dod stong pa'i rang bzhin bsal te bzhengasu gsol// stong pa'i rang bzhin gsal nas si
94b6(rgyud 'grel): yi dngos grub dgos don du// gal te gson par mchis bzhed kyi yi rdo rje bzhengasu gsol// tsaN+Da bdag gis khyod med phyogs ma mthong nas gsol 'debs ni// lha la sogs pa'i 'jig rten bsgrub par dam bcas/
95a1(rgyud 'grel): ci slad bzhugs// bdag ni Dom+bi'i mtshan ma med pa khyod kyi sems ni shes pa ste// thugs rje med pa de mi rung bas sgyu 'phrul lta bur bzhengasu gsol// de dag gsan nas sngon bzhin du//
95a2(rgyud 'grel): AHhUM dag las rdo rje 'dzin// chen po 'od du zhu lngas bzhengs// de nas zhe sdang bdog nyid kyi// rang snying sa bon las byung ba'i// 'bar ba nag po lcags kyu yi// khams gsum gnas pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/
95a3(rgyud 'grel): spyan drangs ma mo brgyad rnams kyis// sngon bzhin mchod de gsol ba gdab// bdag nyid chen po bcom ldan 'das// bcom ldan rnams kyis dbang bskur ba// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// bdag la
95a4(rgyud 'grel): dbong bskur rab tu stsol// oM a d+hi Shiny+tsa tu maM sarba badz+re ta thA ga ta u triSh+Tha na/ de skad gsol ba btab pa yis// bde gshegs de dag thams cad kun// he ru ka yi skur 'gyur te// bde gshegs lnga
95a5(rgyud 'grel): yis bdag nyid kyi// bdud rtsi bum pas dbang bskur te// de tshe ma tog gur gum char// 'bab dang rnga yi sgra grag cing // gzugs kyi rdo rje ma sogs dang // spyan sogs rdo rje dbyangs rnams kyis// dbang
95a6(rgyud 'grel): bskur rab tu byas pa yis// thugs kyi dbang phyug sogs sangs rgyas// dbu rgyan du ni gyur par bya// mi bskyod rtag dang rin chen dbang // mtha' yas de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis// puk+ka sI sogs
95b1(rgyud 'grel): mtshams gnas pa// rim pa bzhin du rgya yis gradab// zhe sdang gti mug ser sna dang // 'dod chags rdo rje ma yis ni// sgro gnas ke rI la sogs pa// rim bzhin du ni gdab par bya// rgya yis gdab cing mtshan pas
95b2(rgyud 'grel): na// des 'dir rgyas zhes bya ba yin// rang snying sa blon 'di zer gyis// sangs rgyas rnams ni gzhug byas te// bdud rtsi myang ba'i sbyor ba yis// de dag tshim po nyid du byA// rlung dang me yi dkyil 'khor ni// zla
95b3(rgyud 'grel): g+ham+ba gru gsum kha dog gnyis// yi ge yaM dang raM gyis mtshan// ba dan dang ni rdo rjes mdzes// de stong ban+d+ha a las byung // der ni ye shes bdud rtsis bkang // yi ge hUM las rab bskyed pa'i// rdo rje las byung

95b6(rgyud 'grel): tshe si// gau rI tsi rI bed+hA lI/ g+hasmai sa spyod pa b+h+yo/ mig dang rna ba sna dang lce// lus dang yid kyi dbang po ni// gti mug zhe sdang ser sna dang // 'dod chags phrag dog rdo rje dang // bdag med rnal 'byor mar shes bya/
96a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo snyan cha mgur chu dang // phyag gdub ska rags phyag rgya lnga// mi bskyod mtha' yas rin chen dbang // snang mdzad don grub bdag nyid do// phyag gnyis thabs dang shes rab
96a2(rgyud 'grel): ste/ phyag bzhi bdud bzhi rnam par dag/ phyag drug pha rol phyin drug go/ bcu drug phyag tu gsungs pa ni// stong pa bcu drug bdag nyid do// zhal gcig stong pa nyid kyi sgo// zhal gsum rnam par thar pa gsum// zhal
96a3(rgyud 'grel): brgyad rnam par thar pa brgyad// zhabs bzhi 'am bdud bzhi dag pa nyid// spyan no dag pa'i rdo rje gsum// dbang po drug dang phung po lnga// skye mched drug dang 'byung ba rnams// ngo bo nyid kyis rnam dag pas// sna tshogs dag
96a4(rgyud 'grel): cing rnam par grol// gzugs yul la sogs gang gi yang // rnal 'byor pa yis mig yor tshul// thams cad rang bzhin gyis dag phyir// sangs rgyas sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs so// rnam par dag pa byis nas ni//
96a5(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor sdom pa'i bdag nyid dang // phyi nang bzlas pa brtsam par bya// de la 'di ni sdom pa ste// oM paM mA ya'i bdag nyid kyi// 'khor lo bzhi ni lus la gnas// 'di ltar sprul pa'i chos dang ni// longs spyod bde chen 'khor
96a6(rgyud 'grel): lo rnams// lte ba snying ga mgul pa dang // spyi bor rim bzhin shes par bya// 'khor lo rnams kyi pad+ma ni// drug cu rtsa bzhi de bzhin brgyad// bcu drug sum cu gnyisu shes// sa bon aM dang hUM dang ni// oM dang haM ste rim
96b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhino// A li kA li sprul pa la// yongasu bskor bar shes par bya// bde gshegs yab yum sa bon gyis/ chos kyi 'khor lo de bzhin bskor// yi ge i e 'dren bcas pas// longs spyod 'khor lo bskor ba yin//
96b2(rgyud 'grel): la pa'i sku dang chos kyi sku// de bzhin longs spyod rdzogs pa dang // sku gsum yongasu shes pa rnams// 'khor lo 'di rnams rang bzhin ni// lha mo bzhi dang phyag rgya bzhi// yi ge 'bru bzhir 'dod ba ste// sangs rgyas spyan
96b3(rgyud 'grel): dang mA ma kI/ dkar mo sgrol ma de bzhin du// las dang chos dang dam tshig dang // phyag rgya chen por brjod pa'o// yi ge e dang baM dag dang // mA dang ya yang 'di yi dngos// de bzhin sku gsung thugs rnams dang //

96b6(rgyud 'grel): rang yang dag gang yin pa 'am// 'khor lo bzhi yi ngo bo'o// dga' dang dam pa'i dga' ba dang // bral dang rang bzhin dga' ba rnams// bde ba'i ye shes cha bzhi ste// drod thob pa dang 'phel ba dang // chags bral
97a1(rgyud 'grel): bde dang mi gnyis bde// de yang 'khor lo bzhi la gnas// gnas brtan thams cad yod par sla// de bzhin mang pos bkur ba dang // dge 'dun phul chen sde zhes pa// sde pa
97a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi yang de nyid yin// rnal 'byor gsang sngags sdom pa dang // ye shes sdom pa'ang bstan par bya// sme sha lte bar 'bar ba yis// de bzhin gshegs lnga bsrogs pa dang // spyan la sogs pa bsregs pa dang /
97a3(rgyud 'grel): haM bsregs zla ba 'bab pa'o// dau ni 'di ltar shes bya ste// rnal 'byor gsang stegs sdom pa yis// bsreg pa'i mtshan nyid shes par bya// bsreg pa me dang rlung yin te// ye shes ma yi snang ba gang // las kyi rlung
97a4(rgyud 'grel): gris bskul ba yin// las kyang bcom ldan shes rab ma'i// rlung gi de nyid 'di yin te// lte ba'i dbus lngas 'phro zhing phra// chos ngong longs spyod bde chen bzhi// brtan dang g.yo ba kun gyi bdag/ yi ge aM gi bdag
97a5(rgyud 'grel): nyid ni// las kyi rlung gi gzhi yin te// 'di las kun tu 'byung ba yin// 'di dag rgyu ba'i ram pa ni// nyi ma gcig la thun bzhi ste// de bzhin chu ched sum cu gnyis// rim pa bcu drug de bzhin du// drug cu rtsa bzhi'i cha dang
97a6(rgyud 'grel): ldan// zla ba nyi ma zhes bya ba'i// A li kA li ngo bo ni// sna bug g.yas dang g.yon du rgyu// de yang sa dang chu dang ni// mo dang rlung gi bdag nyid can// 'byung ba bzhi yi ngo bor 'dod// 'di rnams dusu rgyu ba ste// na mkha'i rang
97b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin dus ma yin// lci zhing mkhrang ba sa yi khams// thur du rgyu bya dang por 'dod// grang zhing rtsub pa chu yi khams// mdun du rgyu ba gnyis pa yin// dro zhing 'jam pa me yi khams// 'di ni phyir la nye bar rgyu// yang zhing stobs
97b2(rgyud 'grel): can rlung gi khams// rgyun du rgyu bar shes par bya// de bzhin chu tshod rim pa dang // thun zhes bya bar grags pa yang // thun zhes bya bar grags pa yang // 'dir ni 'di nyid gzung bya ste// g.ya su ji bzhin g.yon de bzhin /
97b3(rgyud 'grel): de nas kyang ni g.yas yin te// bar chad yod pa ma yin no// dus mini rgyu ba gang zhe na// gang zhig 'chi ba'i dus nyid dang // byang chub sems rgyun 'bab pa dang // nad chen 'byung ba'i snga ltas la// de dag dus gcig
97b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba ste// 'di ni na mkha'i khamasu brjod// rlung dang ye shes rnam shes dang // dug rnams lhan cig rgyu baM ste// nams kyang 'bral ba ma yin// rig pa'i rlung zhes bya ba ni// lus las nam yang mi 'dra' ste// gal
97b5(rgyud 'grel): te 'das na 'chi bar 'gyur// rlung gi de nyid shes pa yis// mA yaM de nyid bskul bar bya// dbugs dang drod kyi khams ngag kyang // tha dad 'jug pa ma yin// dri la mau yi de nyid ni// dbang po gtsubs pa'i sbyor ba
97b6(rgyud 'grel): las// ye shes me ni 'byung 'gyur te// ji ltar phyi rol me bzhin no// de yang dbang po'i lam nas ni// lte ba'i rtsa ru rab tu 'bar// 'od chen du ba bcas pa yis// tsaN+Da lI ni 'bar bar 'gyur// ye shes me yi
98a1(rgyud 'grel): snang ba de// shin tu 'bar bar gyur pa dang // chos kyi 'khor lo la gnas pa'i// bde gshegs lnga dang de bzhin du// lha mor bcas pa tshig par gyur// longs spyod 'khor
98a2(rgyud 'grel): lo byung nas ni// g.yas nas bskor ba ldan gsum byas// smin phrag mdzod sbur byung nas kyang // de nas rna ba g.yasu byung // phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bskul byas nas// spyi bo'i gtsug tu zhugs par gyur//
98a3(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi 'khor lo la babs te// shin tu tshig par gyur pa 'di // sngags kyi sdom par 'dod pa yin// ye shes sdom pa'i bye brag ni// snying gar sangs rgyas bka' 'gros nas// rnam dag bdud rtsi bsdus byas
98a4(rgyud 'grel): te/ sngon gyi lam nas byung nas kyang // phyogs bcu bdud rtsi bsdu byas te// sngon bzhin haM la zhugs gyur pas// sems kyi zla be zhu nas ni// sa yi sbu gu nas byung nas// longs spyod 'khor lor babs pAr gyur
98a5(rgyud 'grel): dur ni cung zad ngal so nas// sngon bzhin phyir yang bskor nas ni// chos kyi 'khor lor babs par gyur// bde bar gshegs rnams gang bar byas// sngon bzhin phyir yang bskor nas ni// sprul pa'i 'khor
98a6(rgyud 'grel): lor babs par gyur// de bzhin kun tu 'gro bar byed// sgra yi rtse mo 'bum gyi cha// ye shes snang ba'i bye brag dag/ mig gis mthong ba ma yin no// 'di ni sdom par brjid pa'o// nang gi bzlas pa bstan pa ni//
98b1(rgyud 'grel): 'og tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor tI// gru gsum gnas ni de bzhin me// lto ba chu yi dkyil 'khor te// de steng dbang chen ri rab bcas// rlung gi dkyil 'khor stang du ni// rtag pa'i 'khor lo bsgom bya ste// de lnga mi
98b2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis bdag nyid kyi// yi ge a yi sdom pa bzung // byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin 'di// lus dang ngag yid gang yang min// 'dod tshugs zhe sdang gti mug mni// kha dog dbyibs sogs ma yin zhing
98b3(rgyud 'grel): khro zhi la sogs rnam par spangs// mtshan ma kun dang bral ba yi// dbu ma chen po sgom par bya// gzhan ni sdom pa ji lta ba'o// 'di ni ci yang ma yin phyir// ma nang bzlas pa zhes 'dod de// bzlas pa'i
98b4(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu gyur pa yin// gal te skyo bar gyur na no// phyi rol bzlas pa brtsam par bya// rang snying sa bon 'od zer gyi// ye shes sems dpa'i gnas nyid dang // sku gsung thugs kyi gnas rnams nas// ji ltar
98b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa spro bar bya// u de ba bi tsu badz+ra hUM hUM phaT swA hA// ha~M badz+ra'i snying po'o// oM trai lok+ShA k+She pa huM huM hu~M phaT swA hA/ phyag gnyis pa'o// oM dz+wa la dz+wa la b+h+yo huM huM huM phaT swA hA/ phyag bzhi pa'i'o// oM kaM Ti ki Ti badz+ra hUM hUM hUM phaT/
98b6(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ phyag drug pa'i'o// oM aSh+TA na nI ye/ bid+hor+d+ha ke sha brta ma ne/ tsa turba sha ti ne twA ya Sho DaM sha b+hu dzA ya kr-iSh+Ti dz+nyA mU ta wa pu She ka pA lA mA la a ne kai d+ha ri Ne Ad+b+ha ta kru ra tsit+tA ya/ an+ten+na daSh+Ti Na mA ra yaM mA ra ya/
99a1(rgyud 'grel): kA ra ya kA ra ya// gardza ya gardza ya/ tar+dz+dza ya tardza ya/ sho Sha ya sho Sha ya/ sap+pa sU ga rAn/ bar+t+ta ban+d+ha/ nA gASh+Ta kAn/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ sha d+h+waM ha hA hi hI hu hU he hai ho ho haM haHphaT swA hA/
99a2(rgyud 'grel): phyag bcu drug pa'i'o// bzlas pas skyo byar gyur pa nA// rdo rje dril bu gsil byas tAM// mchod dang bstod dang smon lam ngag/ legs par btab de phyag rgyu dgrol// dbyingasu bsdu dang gshegs gsol pa/
99a3(rgyud 'grel): dzodzaM lta dza bzhin bya ba yin// de nas rnal 'byor chen po yis// spyod lam kun tu lho nyid kyi// ting 'dzin las nyams mi byi// 'di ltar nyal ba'i tshe na yang // rdo rje 'dzin chen ting 'dzin gyi// chags chen rjes su chags
99a4(rgyud 'grel): byas te// ye shes me yis lus zhu nas// chos sku semasu gyur par nyal// glang tshe sdang ba'i tshe na yang // tshad med bzhi yis bskul ba yis// sngon gyi smon lam rjes dran nas// sgyu ma lta bu'i sbyor ba yis// ting 'dzin
99a5(rgyud 'grel): rim par ldang bar bya// gang zhig za ba chen yang // sdom pa'i dngos po ji lta ba'i// lus ni lha yi dkyil 'khor te// zas te bdud rtsir byin brlab bya// zos pa dbyer med tshim par bya// yang na sbyin sreg mchod pa bya// ra
99a6(rgyud 'grel): sa nA ni me yaM khams// g.yasu 'bar zhing 'phro ba ste// A li'i ngo bor shes par bya// la la nA ni rlung gi khams// g.yon du gtsubs shing g.yo ba ste// kA li'i ngo bor shes par bya// de dbus lus kyi bdag nyid la// bza'
99b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs 'o ma'i sbyin sreg bya// gal te 'gro 'chag byed pa na// rigs lnga rnams la bslang ba dang // phyag rgya la sogs rgyan rnams dang // rdo rje thod pa'i spyod pa dag/ ji skad gsungs pa de bzhin bya// 'dis ni byang chub rnyed mi dka'// gal
99b2(rgyud 'grel): te gtor ma gtong 'ding na// he ru ka yi sbyor ba yis// 'byung po la ni mngon dmigs te// zas rnams bdud rtsir byin brlabs nas// sngags 'di yis ni tshim par bya// oM in+da dza ma/ dza la/ dzak+ShA/ b+hU ta/ baMh+ni/ ba u/ rak+Sha/ tsan+da/
99b3(rgyud 'grel): sud+d+ha mA da/ ba p+pa/ pa tA la/ aT+TA sap+pa swA hA/ i daM/ ba liM/ b+hU dza/ dzi g+ha/ phuwa/ d+hA p+pa/ mA sa/ bi g+ha/ am+b+ha kaSh+Tau/ sA d+ha/ khAn+ti khu Ni/ pha Ta/ gA da/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+har+m+maN+Do Ad+ya nut+pan+na twAta au AHhUM phaT swA hA// gang zhig
99b4(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu 'du byed pa// las rnams thams cad 'grub pa dang / 'byung po'i tshogs rnams dga' nas ni// de la dngos grub myur bar 'gyur// las rnams ngag gi mjug tu yang // mchod dang bstod cing smon lam gdab//
99b5(rgyud 'grel): de la smon lam 'di yin te// rigs ldan skye zhing blo gros rje su ldan// dam tshig ldan zhing kye yi rdo rje ston// snying rje ldan zhing bla ma rnams la gus// skye ba kun tu 'di ltar skye gyur cig/ rdo rje dril bu lag gis 'khyol byed
99b6(rgyud 'grel): cing // zab mo'i dam chos rab tu klog pa dang // dam tshig btsun mo'i khu ba za byed par// skye ba kun tu 'di ltar skye gyur cig/ de nas sprul pa rang lo bsdu// ye shes dkyil 'khor slar gshegs gsol// spyod lam
100a1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs sngon bzhin du'o// slob dpon chen po 'jam dpal ye shes zhabs kyis mdzad pa// he badz+ra'i sgrub thabs he ru ka mnyes par bya ba'i cho ga rdzogs so//
100a2(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po many+dzu shri dz+nyA na dang / rong zom d+har+m+ma b+ha dras bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ shrI he badz+ra nA ma sA d+ha no po kA/ bod skad du/ dpal kye'i rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i
100a3(rgyud 'grel): thabs kyi man ngag/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tsha lo// shes rab thabs ngag bdag nyid can// kye rdor bdag med ma la'ang // bla mur bcas la phyag 'tshal nas// rim pa gsum pa'i sgrub thabs brtsam// mi
100a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid rnyed dka' de bas kyang // bla ma dga' ston rnyed par ngaka2// bdag gzhan don 'byung sngags kyi tshul// 'gro phan lam la brten par gyis// yon tan ldan zhing brtson par ldan// bla mar gus shing dang ldan pa// rgyal
100a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i chos la the tshom med// dbang dang dbye ba nges tshig las// snod yin phyir na drin sbyin bya// chu sogs bum pa'i dbang bskur dang // rim bzhin gsang ba'i dbang bskur dang // shes rab ye shes dbang bskur la// de
100a6(rgyud 'grel): srid bla ma'i man ngag mtha'// yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogasu// ri dang nags tshal dang ni phug/ chu 'gram bzhi mdo mtsho dang ni// shing gcig dben pa dur khrod rnams// bsam gtan khang pa byas nas ni// bdud rtsi sogs kyis
100b1(rgyud 'grel): byug par bya// bris sku sogs mchod dgram byas la// nang par sngar langs sems bdag nyid// phyi rol khrus sogs kun byas la// bde ba'i stan la nyer 'dug ste// sbyong byed dag pa la stsogs kyis// 'dod pa'i lha ni bsgrub/
100b2(rgyud 'grel): par bya// bla ma rdo rje con bsams nas// sems kyi rin chen las byung ba'i// mchod pa'i spri ni spros byas la// de nas rim bzhin dbul bar bya// de nas lha mo brgyad kyis mchod// gI rI byang chub sems kyis mtshang //
100b3(rgyud 'grel): rI rang byung me tog gis// mi bskyod 'dzin pa bed+d+ha lI// snang mdzad kyis mchod g+hasma rI// puk+ka sAM yaus lcags kyus mchod// sA bA rA ni ro 'dzin te// tsaN+Da lI ni rnga chung 'dzin// Dom+bis gnyis med sbyor ba byed// sangs
100b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas chos dang tshogs mchog la// byang chub bar du skyabasu mchi// kye rdor shes rab bdag nyid can// slob dpon la ni skyabasu mchi// sdig pa bdag gis gang byas pa// bdag gzhan don du ma lus pa'o// so sor bshags
100b5(rgyud 'grel): shing slar yang ni// mi bgyid pa yi sdom pa nod// bdo gshegs kun gyi bsod nams dang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang ni// 'gro ba kun gyi bsod nams la// yang dag nyid du yi rang ngo // phyogs bcur
100b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas la// bdag gis de la bskul ba ni// sems can sdug bsngal mun 'thoms la// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul// sems can sangs rgyas thob bar du// rgyal ba de nyid bzhugs/
101a1(rgyud 'grel): nas ni// nam yang mya ngan mi 'da' bar// thal mo sbyar nas gsol bar 'tshal// stong nyid snying rje dbyer med la// byang chub lam ni ston pa po// bsod nams kun gyi 'byung gnas
101a2(rgyud 'grel): che/ byang chub rnams kyang de bzhin bskyed// lus ngag yod kyi bsod nams ni// bgyis sam bgyid du sprul ba dang // rje su yi rang gang ci yang rung // des na 'jig rten kun mkhyen shog/ snying rje rlan gyi brlan sems//
101a3(rgyud 'grel): kyis// tshangs pa yi ni gnas bzhi ni// dang po byams pa bsgom par bya// gnyis pa snying rje rnam par bsgom// gsum par dga' ba bsgom par bya// kun gyi mthu' nas btang snyomaso// dngos rnams bdag la
101a4(rgyud 'grel): bsdu bar bya// bdag kyang ye shes sems dpa'o// ye shes sems dpa' nA da ber// de nyid smig rgyu sgyu mar mtshungs// oM shU n+yA ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko ha~M// oM A ni mi ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM// oM A
101a5(rgyud 'grel): pu Ni hi ta dz+nyA nA badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM// de nas skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin las// skye ba nyid du mos par bya'o// raM las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du hUM laMs sna tshogs rdo rje sa bon dang ldan pa de lus 'od zer 'phros pas
101a6(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bcu'i bdud rnams btul nas// dro ba dang ra ba dang sa gzhir gyur paro bsam par bya'o// de'i dbus su chos kyi 'byung gnas gru gsum pa dka ri bo bsams la// de'i steng du pi las sna tshogs pad+ma// kha las sna
101b1(rgyud 'grel): rtogs rdo rje/ de'i spyong du la la skus dkyil gar b+hU ban pa ltang wa/ dar ba las chu'i dkyil 'khar rnam pa dkar ba/ de las rA lus mye'i dkyil gakhor gragasum dmar ze// der yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gan
101b2(rgyud 'grel): dbyibs 'dra ba nag po// de la thig le dang ldan par bsnams nas/ de rnams gcig tu gyur pas/ gzhal yas khang gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa/ rta babs bzhi dang ka ba brgyad dang / dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa dang / rin po che
101b3(rgyud 'grel): dong 'dod pa'i yon tan la stsogs pas sbas pa/ de'i dbusu pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad panyi ma'i dkyil 'khor der srog song ba dang bcas pas sems las grub par bsam par bya'o// de'i lto bar A li las zla ba'i
101b4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor me long lta bu'i ye shes/ der kA li las mnyam pa nyid yed shes/ de'i dbus su hUM dang aM las rdo rje dang gri gug sa bon gyis mtshan pa so sor kun tu rtog pa'i ye shes/ thams cad gcig tu
101b5(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa bya ba nan tan grub pa'i ye shes/ sku rdzogs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes te/ sku mdog sngon po zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dang thod pa bsnams pas shes rab ma la 'khyud pa/ phyag rgya lnga
101b6(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa spyan gsum pa dbu la thod pa lngas brgyan cing / sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa dbu skra kham pa gyen du brdzes pa/ thod pa rlon pa lnga bcu rtsa bzhis do shil byas pa/ gcer bu g.yas brkyang bas bzhugs
102a1(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o// bdag med ma ni gri gug dang thod pa bsnams shing sku la 'khyud pa skyes pa'i thod pas ngo shal byas shing g.yon brkyang bas bzhugs par bsam par bya ste/ gzhani
102a2(rgyud 'grel): thabs dang 'dra/ nang du yang de bzhin du bsam par bya'o// mig la gti mug rdo rje/ rna bA la zhe sdang rdo rje/ sna la ser sna rdo rje/ lce la 'dod chags rdo rje/ lus la phrag dag rdo rje/ yid la bdag med ma
102a3(rgyud 'grel): bsam par bya'o// de nas rang gi snying ga'i sa bon los 'od zer nag po/ lcags kyu'i dbyibs can spros te/ rang bzhin gyi gnas nas ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la/ mchod yon la sogs pas
102a4(rgyud 'grel): mchod nas/ dam tshig gi 'khor lo la bcug te gnyisu med par bsam par bya'o// yang 'od zer des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad he ru'i gzugs kyis spyan drangs nas/ de la mchod pa la sogs pa
102a5(rgyud 'grel): bya ste/ bdag la byang chub kyi sems kyis dbang bskur nas/ mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan par bsam par bya ste/ ji srid du mi skyo'i bAr du rnal 'byor du bya'o// skyon bzlas pa bya ste/ rig ma'i snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
102a6(rgyud 'grel): de'i dbus su gri gug sa bon dang bcas par bsams la// de la sngags kyi phreng ba kun nga 'dra ba 'od zer dang ldan pa byung nas/ ring gi zhal tu zhugs te/ gsang ba'i rdo rje byung nas/ lha mo'i pad+mar babs te/ lha mo'i zhal nas
102b1(rgyud 'grel): rang gi zhal du zhugs par bsam par bya'o// de bzhin du yang nas yang du bsam par bya'o// oM da ba pi tsu dzA hUM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ yang na bla ma'i man ngag gis gsang ba'i rdo rje dang pad+mar bzlas pa bya'o// brtag pa bcu drug pa
102b2(rgyud 'grel): las// ma phugs pas ni sbyor bral 'gyur// phug pas dga' ba sbyin pa'o// de ltar 'khor bar 'dod pa yi// yon tan lnga ldan rin chen nyid ces gsungaso// de nas yang rdzogs po'i rnal 'byor bshad par
102b3(rgyud 'grel): bya ste/ lte bar sprul pa'i 'khor lo 'dab ma bcu drug pa dkar po'i dbus su rang rig pa'i bdag nyid rin po che'i za ma tog gi nang na gnas par bsamo// snying ga'i chos kyi 'khor lo 'dab ma bcu drug pa thig le dang
102b4(rgyud 'grel): ljon pa/ mgrin par longs spyod kyi 'khor lo 'dab ma bcu drug pa dkar po/ byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa'o// mgo bor bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo 'dab ma bcu drug pa dkar po de'i dbusu lhag pa'i byang chub kyi
102b5(rgyud 'grel): sems 'od dang ldan par bsgom par byas nas/ sprul pa'i 'khor lo las 'od zer 'phros nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo dang longs spyod kyi 'khor lo nas yar song ste/ bde ba chen po las lan gsum bskor
102b6(rgyud 'grel): ba byas nas/ mdzod spu nas phyung ste sems can thams cad sbyangs nas bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs kar zhugs te ye shes kyi bdud rtsi drangs nas/ tshangs pa'i sgor zhugs te gzung 'dzin dang bral nas/ za ma
103a1(rgyud 'grel): tog tu babs par bsam par bya ste/ de la rtse gcig tu bya'o// mi gsal na yang de bzhin du bya'o// yang na bdag med ma rang gi snying gur bsdu/ rang yang hUM la bsdu/ de yang thig
