222b1(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig la gzhug/ lha yi sku ru 'khrungs pa yi// me lha'i lce la ri bkod de// dgang blugs phul te phyin nas ni// mkhas pas gsang sngags 'di bsngago/ de la 'di ni sngagaso// oM ag+na ye in+d+ra byA bai sha
222b2(rgyud 'grel): ma hA shrI ye ha bya ka s+ya bA ha no ya swA hA/ bsang gtor 'thor 'thung phul nas kyang // me tog la sogs mchod par bya// bdag nyid 'dod pa'i lha yi sku// ma yi thugs kar bsgom par byi// mchod pa dam pa
222b3(rgyud 'grel): sngon 'gro ba// yon chab zhabs bsil la sogs dbul// de phyir mar gyi dgang blugs rnams// bdud rtsir bsams nas dbul bar bya// shrI bi'i ro la dri zhim chus// khrus gsol mar gyis byugs pa
222b4(rgyud 'grel): ni// n+ya gro d+ha sogs yam shing lha// sngags 'di brjod cing bsreg par bya// oM AHbadz+ra satwa a mu kaM badz+ra tsar+ya su khA ba ti pra prA ya swA hA/ zhes pa'i sngagaso// 'thor 'thung na bza' ser po dang // so rtsi 'dag
222b5(rgyud 'grel): rdzas byed pa dbul// dril bu rab tu dkrol na su// bstod pa dang ni mchod pa bya// de nas sngags pa mnyam bzhag pas// thugs kar me tog thal sbyar te// dmar sogs skyon rnams zhi ba'i phyir// bzod par
222b6(rgyud 'grel): gsol zhes yang dag brjod// gang yang bdag blo gti mug pas// lhag pa ma tshang gang byas pa// gang yang lus can skyabs gyur pa'i// dpal ldan de nyid kyis bzod mdzod// gus pas bzod pa gso
223a1(rgyud 'grel): byA'i mthar// rang gi gnang ba bsgom par bya// yi ge brgya pa brjod nas kyang // me lha mnga' bdag gshegasasu gsol// nyi ma de yang gnyis pa la// 'o mas me la thugs byas nas// 'byung ba rus
223a2(rgyud 'grel): bu kun btus te// gtsang ma'i snod tu bcangs byas nas// de nas rus bro btus pa rnams// mkhas pas pa yi 'o mas ku/ 'jim pa bsres nas sA tsha gdab// snying po mchod rten brtsig par bya// de la sgo gdung rgyal po'i mchod
223a3(rgyud 'grel): rten brtsig/ sangs rgyas mthu' yas mchog gis byin gyis brlabs// gtsang ma'i snod du legs par bcangs byas nas// sangs rgyas kyis gsungs rim par rab gnas mdzad// tshangs pa la sogs rnams kyang
223a4(rgyud 'grel): grus pas 'drung // de bas skye bo bshes glunyen+d+ra stan sbyor bdud// byang chub cho ga yiswa ni khaste 'ches pas// de ni mchod rten rgyas pa chen po ste// don che'i rgyu ru gusta pas yang dag mchod// dur khrod mchod rten byas pas
223a5(rgyud 'grel): ri bo can las khyad par 'phags pa de yis ni// dge ba glang zhig bstsags pa de yis 'gro ba gsum du son pa'i skye bo rnams// dngos po dgra sogs btul ba'i shes rab mchog mnga' thugs rjesu skye ba mchog tu brtse/
223a6(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten gsum gtsug dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' ring por mi thogs 'grub par shog/ ro sreg pa dge slong ta thA ga ti rak+Shi tas mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang / lo che ba
223b1(rgyud 'grel): dge slong dar ma blo gros kyis bsgyur ba'o// / dpal rdo rje mkha 'gro la phyag 'tshalo// lag na rdo rje dril bu byin nas ni// dbu la lag pa'i dbu rgyan ni// byin nas rdo rje sdom pa yang // sdom pa byin da'i man ngag nyid//
223b2(rgyud 'grel): mig la sogs pa'i gti mug sogs// gtor gsum go 'phang gsum la bzhag/ rdo rje thab khung sbyor ba yis// gdung bsreg pa yang yang dag bya// nyi ma gsum pa'i nyin bAr+ya ni// rus bI'i tshegs ni legs par+yA bas+t+ra/
223b3(rgyud 'grel): be ma dri zhim gyis khrus bya// des ni mchod rten bya ba'o// 'di'i don ni dang por zhim pas khrus bya ba dang / gos la sogs pa byas pa'i dbu rgyun sbyin pa dang / dkyil 'khor bri ba dang / dkyil 'khor sgrub pa la sogs
223b4(rgyud 'grel): pa byas nas/ chu dang / dbu rgyanA dang / rdo rje dang / bdag po dang / ming dang / bum pa rnams kyis dbang bskur nas/ rang gi lhog pa'i lha'i gzugasu bskyed la/ ye shes sems dpa' dgug pa la sogs pa sngon du
223b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gro bas mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas nas/ sngags kyi tshogs mang po bzlas po bya ba dang / mchod pa dang / bstod pa dang / bdud rtsi myang ba byas nas/ sngags kyis bzlas pa mang po byA ba drang
223b6(rgyud 'grel): ji lta ba bzhin du me thab me lha bskyed la de'i thugs kar rdo rje sems dpa' 'am/ rang gi lhag pa'i lha 'khor dang bcas pa dkyil 'khor bskyed de shi ba'i lus kyi ye shes sems dpa' gsheg su gsol// de'i dam
224a1(rgyud 'grel): tshig sems dpa' dang ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa ro gcig tu gyur par lhug par mos shing gdung bsreg par bya zhes bya ba'i don to// gang de ltar mi byud na de tshe mchod rten
224a2(rgyud 'grel): bshig pa nyid du 'gyur ba'o// gdung bsreg pa'i cho ga rdzog so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po A shrI dz+nyA nA dang / lo tsaM ba dge slong dpal gyi snying pos bsgyur ba'o// gur gyi don e shwa kas man ngag du
224a3(rgyud 'grel): brtsamaso// / rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hA rat+na kA la nA ma sA d+ha naM pa ye kA/ bod skad du/ dpal rin po che'i char yang zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshalo// shwa ra ba
224a4(rgyud 'grel): ma yin nub pa min// dngos po med pa rtag tu shAr// thams cad kun khyab brjod du med// rang rig bdag nyid phyag 'tshal lo// rnal 'byor rnams kyis rnyed dka' ba// mkhas ba kun gyis rnyed mi nus// gang gi drin gyis
224a5(rgyud 'grel): rnyed slar 'gyur// bla ma'i zhabs lha phyag 'tsha l-I// m+b+hi sh+logasku khel mos bcings pa rnams// rdo rje rkang pa'i dba' rlabs kyis// phyogs rnams thams cad la khyab pa'i// sus 'dri gaN+DI rnying ba yi chu// gter gting dngag dka
224a6(rgyud 'grel): shin tu dka'// de bas dpal ldan thi ga chen po'i// thig le yi ni chu yaM gter// dbus snyoms pa de las ni// yon tan gter ni rin chen rgyal// shes rab dpal gsang bdag gis ni// rin thang chen por di ring drang // rim pa gnyis
224b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi go rims kyi// ye shes mkha 'gro bsgom pa 'di// bla ma'i lung gis rang gis min+d+ra// skal ldan 'grub don bdag gis brtsam// rdzogs pa'i ye shes mkha' gro la// de la bskyed pa gzhung ma yin+tu// phyag dang gzugs s+ho
224b2(rgyud 'grel): brjod pa yis// de ltas kun rdzob skye bar 'gyur// de la kun rdzob rigs ma yin// don dam pa lta 'gog pa yin// gal te bsgom pa goms pa las// kun rdzob skyon mod khyod 'gyur na// den dom pa yi sna phyogs
224b3(rgyud 'grel): la ni/ kun+da rdzob de ni skyon du 'gyur// brten pa las ni don grub na// the tshom med par log pa yin// de ni dpal rinI rdor zhabs kyi// bdag med sgrub thabs la gsungs pa'o// do na go rims bdag gis ni// cung
224b4(rgyud 'grel): zung tsam no bshad par bya// bsgom lngas de ni rtog pa ste// rtog med pa ni gang na'ang med// rtog pa med pa'i gang ming ci// thams cad yang dag rtog spangs pa// rtog pa med las gang gzhan ni// sgom pa mchog ni
224b5(rgyud 'grel): yod pa 'am// gal te de la yod na ni// 'khrul pa med pa de la min// slob dpon mkhas pa kam+bu las// snang ba'i phreng las de skad gsungs// bzang du dang ni ngan pa yi// rtog pa'i bye brag de lta ci// rten gyi bye drug tha dad /
224b6(rgyud 'grel): med// me yi tsha ba'i bya ba ltar// tsan+dan rang ni 'bar na yang // reg pa byas na tshig par 'gyur// de bas rtog pa mnyam pa yin// de la bye brag cung zad med// rtog pa yin na de nyid mon// de nyid yang dag rtog pa spangs//
225a1(rgyud 'grel): de nyid min pa spang don du// de kho na nyid gnas pa la// bsgom pa gzhan ni bsnyen byed na// de ni bsgom pa ji ltar yin// de khyo nyid la sgom pa med// de nyid mya yin de yin bsgom// de nyid ma yin bsgoms
225a2(rgyud 'grel): bslabs las// de nyid ma yin gsal bar 'gyur// de nyid gsal ba ga la ste// de ni mtshan med de yang min// de nyid min pa bsgom rigs pas// de kho nyid ni bsgom bya ste// de nyid bsgom pa rigs pa yin//
225a3(rgyud 'grel): sgom pa gnyis ni ngal ba'i don// yang na de med kyis de ni// nAm yang de ni rnyed ma In// rnyed pa'i don du 'bad byas ste// de la bsgom pa'i don ci'i phyir// de ni dpal rin rdor zhabs kyis// dpal sgom rim
225a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i nang nas gsungs// gang gis gang don rnyed dka' ba// dri yis nam yang rnyed ma yin// ji ltar mgon mr-id mi gcig ni// bdag ni rgyal por sgom byed pa// log pa'i ye shes gti mug gis// de yis
225a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyal sa rnyed mI 'gyur// in+d+ra b+hU taM rgyal chen pas// yAM shes grub las de skad gsungs// rdzogs pa yi ni rub sgo yasi// bskyed pa yaM ni sgom byed nr-i// rgyu med las ni rnyed pa med// rgyu yin nga nas don mi 'byung /
225a6(rgyud 'grel): rang las ma yin gzhan las min// gnyi ga las min rgyu med min// yod min med min yod med min// 'o na gang nas byung ba yin// rten cing 'brel pa de las ni// skye bar sgom pa byed pa na// rten 'brel
225b1(rgyud 'grel): las skyes skye ba min+da// thams cad mkhyen pas du skad gsungs// klu sgrub pa'i zhalnga sta nas// sgyu dang mi skye stong par gsungs// de lta'i gzhung lug yod na yang // de bzhin bskyed pa gzhung lugs// nad pa sos pa'i blangs
225b2(rgyud 'grel): de ni/ smra ba po ni ci yin rtog/ de yi thobs ni mi byed na// nam yang skyes par mi 'gyur// rje su smra ba rdzogs byas dang // yan tan yod pa'i smra ba po// de yi smra ba nyan byed na// kun tu byokra shis 'grub par 'gyur// sgom
225b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rim pa mdzad pa yi// de yi zhal nas de skad gsungs// mngon sum dang ni rje su dpag/ sangs rgyas pa ni de gzung ngo // nges pa pa dang rje su dpag/ badren pa de las rnyed pa'o// stong pa nyid ni rnyed pa gang // de las
225b4(rgyud 'grel): rnyed par grwa la 'gyur// dngos po yin na nges yod de// dngos po las ni rnyed pa yod// dngos por mthong ba'i phyir na ni// de la stong par ji skad smra// stong pa'i ming ni ci yang min// de skad yin na de la smra// stong pa cang min/
225b5(rgyud 'grel): de ltar min// thams cad stong pa yin pa po// dngos po nyid ni stong pa yin// dngos po med pa'i rang bzhino// rang bzhin gang la yod pa ni// de ni mtshan ma yin par bshad// dngos po gcig pu'i ngo bo ste// de spangs pa
225b6(rgyud 'grel): ni stong par bstan// ngo bo nyid bral stong pa ste// ye shes zhabs kyi rim pa yod// dngos po med pa'i dngos po ni// thams cad kun la yod pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gsungs// dpal ldan ye shes rgya
226a1(rgyud 'grel): mtshor gnas// ji ltar gla rtsi dngos po ni// gnyi su gyes pa yod pa ste// sra ba'i dngos po de dang gcig/ dri yi dngos po de dang gnyis// sra ba'i dngos po spangs pa gang // de ni dngos po
226a2(rgyud 'grel): min par gsungs// sra ba'i dngos po meng ba la// de las dri ni mi rnyed na// ci ste de las dri mi rnyed// rang gi dpe la bltas pa yis// ji ltar dri med phra ba'i ras// bdug byas de la bag chags yod// gla rtsi gzhan ma'i
226a3(rgyud 'grel): gnasu bzhag/ de skad dngos po med pa la// dngos po thams cad yod pa'o// de bzhin rgyu mtshan med pa la// bden pa'i 'bras bu yod pa'o// ji ltar chu sbyin du ga las// rdo rje me ni gsal bar skyes// de bzhin gzugs
226a4(rgyud 'grel): min la gzugs yod// de bzhin dngos min dngos po yi// 'khrul ba'i dngos po'i gzugs yin na// de la nyes skyon ci yang med// 'khrul pa la yang yon tan yod// 'khrul gzhan de yis med par byed//
226a5(rgyud 'grel): sngags dang sgom pa byed pa pa s+t+ra// dug la dug med mtshan ma nA// dug gri 'khrul pa med pa 'di// dug med 'khrul pa bsten pas so// bla ma yi ni bla ma yis// de ni bsgom pa'i rim las gsungs// rtog pa'i sems nI
226a6(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba gang / rtog pa yis ni dag par byed// de bzhin kye yi rdo rje'i rgyud// rdo rje snying po la 'di gsungs// gang 'di dug gi dum bu yis// sems can thams cad 'tshe bar 'gyur// dug de yi ni de nyid kyis// dug gi/
226b1(rgyud 'grel): dug ni med par byed// ji ltar me yis tshig pa la// me yis yang dang yang bsgrog bya// de bzhin 'dod chags mes bsregs la// 'dod chags ma yis yang bsre bya// ji ltar rna bar chu song la// phyi ma'i chu yis gdab
226b2(rgyud 'grel): par bya// de bzhi ni chos can rtog pa ni// dngos po yis ni dag par byed// dngos po bag chags gzung bas ni// chos can bag chags med par byed// goms pa yos ni kun med de// phyi nas de yang med pa'o// de nus dri
226b3(rgyud 'grel): med ye shes ni// 'bad mi dgos par gsal ba'o// rang las skyu ru re ltar mthong // dpal ldan ye shes rgyud las gsungs// ji ltar 'di yi dpe yis ni// shing gi yal ga'i zla ba lhor// mdzub mo gang gis mchod
226b4(rgyud 'grel): byed pa// de las de ni skye 'gyur ram// mdzub mo la sogs bya ba tsam// de yos de ni gsal bar 'gyur// ji ltar mun pa'i mu tig gcig/ mar me med na mthong mi 'gyur// mar mes de ni mthong ba las// mar me las
226b5(rgyud 'grel): no mi skye'o// mar me yos ni blta ba las// mar me de la sgom mi byed// dwe yi de ni rigs pas rdzogs// rnyed 'gyur de la sgom mi byed// de nas thur 'dod pa la 'di// lam rab shin tu gsal bar bya// rgya mtsho chen po'i
226b6(rgyud 'grel): gsang ngos sam// yang na dur khrod mchog dang ni// yang na dgyes po'i ri phug dang // thams cad bdag nyid dgon chen por// yang dag rnal 'byor pa yis ni// mgon po ha ru ka mnyes bya// langs nas dang po rnal 'byor
227a1(rgyud 'grel): pas// snying rje rlan gyis brlan sems kyis// tshangs pa yi ni gnas bzhi ni// dga' ba yod pa bsgom par bya// de nas rang snying kha pad la// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// de dbus sems
227a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi sa bon ni// sna tshogs 'od dang ldan pa bsgom// de yi 'od rnams snang ba las// bla ma dang ni sangs rgyas dang // rang lha na mkha' khyab mthong ba// chu lha lta bu'i rang bzhin can// sna tshogs mchod pa dbul ba ni// byas
227a3(rgyud 'grel): nas skyabasu 'gro bar bya// dkon mchog gsum la sogs pa ni// rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes dag/ de yi bsod nams kyi ni tshogs// yang dag par ni 'phel bar 'gyur// ye shes tshogs ni 'phel don du// steng pa
227a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid ni bdag nyid yin// thams cad rmi lam lta bur balnga// skad cig ma yi sgyu 'phrul can// ji ltar chu zla lta bu dang // dri za'i grong khyer lta bu'o// gcig dang du mas rnam dpyad na// sbyor ba med pas mtshan nyid med// 'das
227a5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang ni ma 'ongs med// da ltar yang ni de bzhi no// 'das pa de ni 'gags pa yin// ma 'ongs pa ni ma byung ste// de ltar mi gnas khab rtse la// nam yang gnas pa med pa'o// de lta bur ni thams cad bsam// de nas
227a6(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni dpyad par bya// stong pa las thams cad 'byung // stong pa'i ngang du thams cad nug/ dag pa'i ngo bo stong pa ste// stong pa'i rang bzhin du ni bstan// dag pa sku ru brjod pa ste// gsung ni stong pa'i ngo bo yin// rang bzhin
227b1(rgyud 'grel): thugasu bshad pa ste// de ni rnal 'byor pa yis bsam// sprin med nu mkha'i dngos po la// sems ni mi g.yo bar ni gzhag/ de yis don byeng yang dag pa'i// gsang sngags 'di ni brjod par bya// oM swa b+hI ba/
227b2(rgyud 'grel): shud+d+haHsarba d+har+m+ma swa b+hA ba shwad+d+hi haM/ oM shU n+ya twA dz+nyA na badz+rA swa dz+nyA be at+ma ko ha/ de yis ye shes kyi ni tshogs// sku gsung thugs ni rnam par dag/ tshogs chen gnyis ni rdzogs pa yis// skad cig gcig gi s+ya byu/
227b3(rgyud 'grel): chub 'thob// bsod nams de ni mchog yin te// de bzhin ye shes chad pa'o// de gnyis dbusu byang chub ni// rang bzhin ye shes mtshan nyid// de nas paM byung pad+ma dang // raM las byung ba'i nyi dkyil du// hUM las khro bo'i rdo
227b4(rgyud 'grel): rje ni// spro ba'i bdag nyid can gyis bsam// dang po'i suM d+ha ni sum b+ha dang / gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na de bzhin// gr-ih+NA po ya gnyi su bya// A na ya ho de bzhin te// b+hA ga bAn badz+ra bid+d+ha rA dzaM ste// 'di yis phyogs ni bcing bar bya// oM dang hUM gnyis
227b5(rgyud 'grel): mi snre la lA// mthar yAng hUM phaT sbyor ba bya// suM b+hu'i sku bdag sngags pi yis// shAr la sogs par sngags gdab bya// sna tshogs rdo rje'i se gon ni// hUM las 'phro bar bsgom par bya// de yis 'od zer gas
227b6(rgyud 'grel): ba yis// rtsig pa dang ni bla bro'o// stong gi mnga' yi dra ba ni// rdo me lce 'bar ba'o// dang po yi ni bzhi pa gnyis// ga ta ya ni gnyis par bya/ sarba tuSh+TaM de nas gdab// kI la ya ni gnyis bya ste// sarba pA paM de nas ni// badz+ra
228a1(rgyud 'grel): kI la de nas dran// de nas badz+ra d+ha ra gdab// adz+nyA pa ya de bya'o// kA ya bAk+tsit+ta badz+ra ste// kI la yang ni de nas dran/ badz+ra mung+ga badz+ra dang // kI la ku ha de naso// oM yig dang ni hUM phaT mthar//
228a2(rgyud 'grel): dbusu hUM gis ldan par bya// mi shigs pa yi rdo rje'i gur// dwe yi sngags kyis bsgom par bya// rdo rje gur gyi dbusu nI// chos dbyings phyag rgya b+ha ga dngos// de ni dbus bsgom bya ste// rlung la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khru
228a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi// daM yi steng du ye shis me// hUM gis dngos po'i bdag nyid bstem// rlung so gas+t+ri yongasu gyur bI las// mchog gi gzhal yos khyod du gyur// gru bzhi pA la sogs ldan no// dpral ldan he ru ka yi gnas// gat+yaM
228a4(rgyud 'grel): drag dur khrod la sogs ni// de yi phyi rol bskor ba'o// pA ta pu ta ri sogs kyi// shing rnams kyis ni rab tu brgyan// khwa gzugs la sogs dpa' bo ni// shing rnams la gnas byin gyis rlobs// snam dang khyu
228a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas la sogs ni// nang nAM dur khrod+mo phyi rol lde// gsang ba'i nang dam yang na lus// dbugs byed phyi rol na dur khrod// mthus byad ma rnams kyi ni rtsi// pa ta la sogs shing yino// dur khrod nang du pad+ma nI// sna tshoDa
228a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dab ma brgyad pa'o// lte ba'i nang gi phyag rgya ni// gru gsum b+ha ga'i gzugs can// rder mche mo dang legs dgyes rdor// de bzhin rdo rje glang chen ma// gru gsum la ni bsgom bya ste// nang du ma yin phyi rol min//
228b1(rgyud 'grel): srid dang mya ngan 'das pa'i steng // snang ba dang ni snang ba mched// dbyangs yig dpe byad las byung ba// sems can zhu ba'i rang bzhin can// de yi hUM bruM mthong ba ni// dpal rdor sems dpa'i bdag nyid// 'od kyi rigs
228b2(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa yi// rang bzhin gyis dig yongasu gyur// de nas smon lom gzhan don du// bya yi rnal 'byor rang don min// de ltar shes pas lha mo yi// bstod par shes las yang dag 'byung // bde chen legs dgyes
228b3(rgyud 'grel): mgo ni po bzhengs// rdo rje legs dgyes bdag dga' mdzod// mgon po khyod min bdag ro 'dra// thugs rje ro yis bdag skye mdzod// kye mgon stong phyi'i tshed pa'i mtshan// rdo mtshe ma bdag dga' ba mdzod// pad+ma kha
228b4(rgyud 'grel): phyi rol cig rol// mgron po stong pa'i rang bzhin min// a la la la a la la la/ a la la l+ya ljags dgyes mgon// rdo rje glang chen mra dga' mdzod// khyod rang gis gsungs bdag min na// sangs rgyas 'byung
228b5(rgyud 'grel): bar mi 'gyur ro// glu 'di yi ni ngor mdzad nas// spro hUM snang las yang dag 'phros// de las rdo rje gri gug ni// yongasu gyur pas de nas nyid// dpal ldan he ru che mgron po// lha mos 'khyud par gyur pa'o// bud
228b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i mdog la phyag bcu drug/ zhal bcu drug la spyan gsum pa// sngo dang ser dang dmar dang ljang // zhal bzhi g.yon nas bskor ba'o// gzhan ni sku mdog de dang 'dra// steng gi zhal ni 'jigs par ldan// thod pa'i phreng bas
229a1(rgyud 'grel): dbu la brgyan// zla phyed dbu rgyan gyis mtshan pa// thong rlon phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// nyi ma'i gdan la khro tshul ldan// phyag rgya drug gis yan lag brgyan// nyi ma bye ba'i 'od dang mtshungs// g.yas
229a2(rgyud 'grel): brkyang steng 'og zhabs mnga' ba// gur dgu dngon ldan bu'o// zhabs ni rnam pa bzhi rnams kyis bdud pa ni yaM ni steng na gzhugs// gshin rje dwags pa'i sham thabs lnga// thod pa'i dum bu'i ska rags bcings// phyag ni
229a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khyung po'i g.yas pa dang // rdo rje dang nI dril bu g.yon// phyag gnyis brgyad bas tshangs pa'i lpags// gr-izhan gnyis mda' gzhu 'gengs pa'o// 'khor lo rin chen rol gri dang // rtswa gsum nyi ma g.yas na
229a4(rgyud 'grel): bsnams// Da ma ru dang ste re zla// thod pa'i snod dang kha T+wA~M ka/ ye shes mkha' gro dbang phyug gi/ g.yon du de ni shes par bya// legs dgyes dbang mo da dang 'dra// yang nA phyag ni bzhi dang ldan// zhal gcig
229a5(rgyud 'grel): bapa liM spyan gsum pa/ gcer bu dang ni thugs rje che// skra ni grol zhing nu ma swA// sgeg pa la sogs rgyan dang ldan// sdigs mdzub yin pi'i gri gug ni// g.yas pa'i phyag gis 'dzin pa mang shwe// kha T+wAM gA dung kyA
229a6(rgyud 'grel): bApA la// khrag gi bkang ba g.yon na bsnams// 'khrung po'i sgeg pa'i sbyor ba yis// gzhan ma rdo rje mda' gzhu'o// yan lag phyag rgya drug gis brgyan// thad dum ska rags dag gis brgyan// byin pa gnyis kyis
229b1(rgyud 'grel): legs bakhyud cing // bde ba chen po'i gnas na bzhugs// gru gsum gnas kyi rnal 'byor ma/ drug phyed bcom ldan 'das kyi gzhi// zhal dang rjesu mthun par bsam// ljang gu gcig gis sbyangs pa'o// zhal
229b2(rgyud 'grel): gcig pa la spyan gsum pa// g.yon brkyang po yi gnas byas bzhugs// phyag bzhi pa la 'jigs chen ma// phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan pa'o// dbu sgra ral pa gcer pu dang // thod pa'i dri shal brgyan pa'o//
229b3(rgyud 'grel): ro steng gnas pa 'od 'bar ma// la la la sogs dag pa'o// rang byung re dang ga pur dang // de yis pad snod bkang ba'o// g.yas pa yi ni phyag na thogs// kha T+wA~M ga ni g.yon na'o// b+ha ga'i phyag rgya'i
229b4(rgyud 'grel): dbu steng du// mdzub mo tshangs pa'i bu ga'i dkyil// bde chen dang ni me 'khor lo// gnas gcig par ni brda yis mtshon// bde ba chu skyes me 'kho lo// phyi rol ma yin nang du min// sprul pa'i 'khor lo bi ri Da
229b5(rgyud 'grel): byas ni// sprul pa dang ni bde ba chen po// gad na bcom ldan 'das ni bzhugs// de ni bde chen pos brjod// rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid kyis ni// de bzhin gsang bas rgyud las gsungs// gang na bde ba bdag
229b6(rgyud 'grel): nyid bzhugs// de ni bde ba chen po'o// de yi shar phyogs o T+yaN du// lha mo 'jigs ma de spyi bor// dzA lan+d+ha ra byang du steng // dpa' bo ma ni spyi bo gtsug/ nub tu pul+li ra ma ste// chang 'thung ma ni 'tsho
230a1(rgyud 'grel): mA r-I// snron+ta k+Sha mAn+ta b+hU s+t+wa~M/ 'dzag su mAn+ta s+thAn+ta h+lA g+sa dad+d+has// dAn+ta kAnasan+na nA smin te// ts+tsha 'aM kAR+tha s+yA sh+tsat+sA d+ba d+hat+ko// s+yA y+YA gas m+b+ha ka b+hU/ b+h+ya r+b+humA nr-i sUn+d+han+dan+do// b+h+yon+ma d+b+har+m+ma/
230a2(rgyud 'grel): phyogas+ya san d+hu ste/ stobs ma mig gauny+tsasA la nAM gnas// rlung gi phyogs nA gar+yA taM// nA mAgrin ma n+yA nU gnyis// dbang ldan phyog+sa su sing gA la// r+d+ha rnA ma nr-i khyA pAd+l-i dr-i// dwe ni bde na ny+dza khai r-I lo ste// rdo rje g+h+r-i gug
230a3(rgyud 'grel): gros ni bskor// gnyis lnga longs spyod 'khor lo ste// dmar buM pad+mo'i phreng bas bskur// de yAM shwar phyogs mA ma ni// glang chen rnaM ba'i kau skra'o// byung phyogas+yA daM bi kro TI ste/ lte bA m+b+ha nI mag+nin gling byuR+sha// n+ye'i pyug pa
230a4(rgyud 'grel): ni ku lu ta/ me ma rgyab kyi gling bur ro// lho phyogs an+ma tA ra ni ste// chu rgyun 'bebs ma'o ma'i snod// dwe ni zhing dang nye ba'i zhing // de bzhin tshan+da daM nye tshon dor// me'i phyogs ha ri ki la ste// zla ba di ni snying khar ro//
230a5(rgyud 'grel): bden bral phyogasu 'ag+h+ra ta par// nyi 'od mo ni lte ba ru ro// rlung gi phyog su lam+b+ha pa kAr// du rna ma ni gsang bar d+yo// dab ldan phyog su kany+tsi kA/ dung g+hats+tsha ga mA ni rgyu la mtshAnra d+ha bus// shAR+ShA phyogasu nI dkAr+ya
230a6(rgyud 'grel): dmar sti// drong steng ma yi rgyal mtshan rtser// byang phyogs tri mi ka ra sti// stobs chen ma ni gzhang pad du// nub phyogasu naM keng kon ti// byaM rgod ma ni brla gnyis dran// lho phyogasu ni bin+d+ha ste// rgod kha man
230b1(rgyud 'grel): A kAHs+ya/ m+me bau klas y-i dgas 'dus bya hA// bA mA nI d+hu d+hu d+hA// badren dul blags rgyum+b+ha dz+nyAn dgam+b+ha// ts+tshin+ta m-ig+sa sta nA~M/ d+ha smA d+hamA/ rlu blugs n+yar+ya d+han+ta s+ho// san+d+ha Sh+Ta /

230b4(rgyud 'grel): ro// me yi phyog su sa bla ste// nagra mo chos 'khor lte bar ro// bden bral phyog su s+ya stengs tAM// ri bong mA nI lte snying du// rlung gi phyogasu s+ya br-i ga ste// ro dwags mo nr-i sbrul snying l+r-i re// dbang ldan phyogaswA su rI rab
230b5(rgyud 'grel): rtse// ra mA ma~M ni gos snang d+he// bi lA nye ba'i bi la bar// de bzhin sbyor dang nye ba'i sbyor// d+he naM sprul pa'i 'khor lo ste// dkar po 'khor lo'i phreng bas bsnur+ya// bzhir gtigs rnal 'byor mA/
230b6(rgyud 'grel): zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// sdigs mdzub ldan pa'i gri gug ni// thams cad kun gyis phyag g.yas bsdams// kha T+wAM ga dang ka pA la// khrag gis bkang ba g.yon na'o// phyag gzhan dgo ni gnyis
231a1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kyis// mda' gzhu khyengs par 'gengs pa'o// gru gsum gtogs pa gzhan ji ltar// gan su gtogs pa de ltar ro// ji ltar 'khor lo rnams kyi mdog/ rnal 'byor pa yang de
231a2(rgyud 'grel): ltararo// rdo rje ro langs rdor 'dra ba// rdo rje rtse mo rdor zlum ma// gnag dang dmar dang ser dang dkar// shar sgo la sogs gnas na bzhugs// chu srin nya dang seng ge dang // 'ga' ru ra ni g.yas na thogs// kA pU la
231a3(rgyud 'grel): dad+ya khA T+wA~M g+h+ra/ g.yon gyi phyogasasu dran pa'o// gzhan gnyis rdo rje mda' gzhu ni// rna lhag du ni 'gengs par dran// rdo rje ske rags de dpag bcing // rdo rje ser po dang ni gnyis// rdo rje rgod mya gsum bya ste// rdo rje nyi ma
231a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa'o// rnga dang de bzhin gling bu dang / rgyud mangs dang ni rdza rngu dang // rdzi rnga chung ngu cha la chung dang // tam+b+ha rA dang ke ran to// de rnams phyag ni gnyis gnyis shes// mtshams kyi lha mo'i rim par ro// bcom ldan
231a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dus ni mnyes byed gnas// gzugs gnyis pa la yid 'phrog pa// brgya la sogs pas de rnams ni// ji ltar 'jigs pa'i lha mo rnams// gnas sogs pa sar shes bya// bdun gnyis kyi ni glengs

231b1(rgyud 'grel): dang ni bcas par bsgom// yang nA rgyud kyi mun ngag bsgom// 'di ni 'khor lo drug kyang yod// bde ba chen po la sogs lnga// ma yi 'kho lo yod byas so// sgro dang mtshums ni mnyam ldan pa// de ni rlung 'kho

232a1(rgyud 'grel): po khams dang skye mched kyi// dag pa yin par 'di bstan to// rigs chen bshad pa'i rgyud las ni// de lta bu yi dag pa grags// rdor gsum yig gsum ye shes ni//
232a2(rgyud 'grel): dgod me'i gnasu yi ge yis// ye shes sems dpa' dgug par bya// dam tshig sems dpa' la ni byastim// de ni gnyi ga re gcig bya// ji ltar chu lA chu bzhag bzhin// mthe'u chung lug gu rgyud kyi dngosta/

232a5(rgyud 'grel): rnyed paR+Sha 'gyur// au sarbaM b+hi r+ya dang pr-i ste// yo gr-i yang de bzhino// kA ya prA ka ni tsit+ta dang // badz+ra swa b+hA ba de bzhin du// At+ma ko ha de nas ni// ye shes sems dpya'u rnam pA ra drag/ phyi rol sngags yig yod pa yi//

233a3(rgyud 'grel): mau byed// rang bzhin de las shes par bya// skye dang 'gag pa spangs pa'o// A~M badz+ra shud+d+ha dang // sarba d+har+m+ma de bzhin yang // badz+ra shud+d+ha taM zhes te// go cha de ni sngags rgyu la yin// chos kyi dbyings kyi bum chen po/

233a5(rgyud 'grel): pApar ni// ji ltar balpA me byA tsAmAM gyis nI// de bzhino gshegs kun khrusa? gla sol ba// de bzhin bdag gi lha yi chu// dag pra ya se no khrus bya'o// oM sarba tatA thA ga ta a b+hi She ka sa ma ya shrI ye hUM phaT swA hA//
233a6(rgyud 'grel): de nas bde tshan 'khor lo'i bzhi// pad+ma'i snod kyi dbus no// rin chen lnga ni lha'i mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid// char yang stong na ye shes ma// de yi 'og nis rang dbang rlung // g.yon bskor
233b1(rgyud 'grel): nas ni me 'byur bya// de yi bdud rtsi zhu bya'o// rder gAsmamra ye shes sa b+h+yon gyis// dkar sbyangs rtogs byas bya bar byas+ho// sngags kyi de nyid byin+da gyis brlabs// rang lce pad+ma'i 'dab mar bzhag/ phyi rlung bdag nyid can gyi gzugs
233b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo de yis rab tshim bya// 'khor lo lci ba'i phyi rol tu// bdud rtsi nam yang spang mi bya// dpa' bo'i drababo bo kha yi nang // ske yi gan su gzung bar bya// thur du nam yang gtang mi bya// de nas mgon po'i snying

235a1(rgyud 'grel): shes pArar+ya dka' ba yin// skye med ni ga la shes// de ltar yin nA de la'ang brjod// skye ba med kyang mi gsal min// mya skyes na'ang rtag tu shwa ra// ji ltar na mkha' skye med bzhin// shin

235b1(rgyud 'grel): tshig shes dang bsam gtan gnas// bla ma la ni rtse gcig gus// sngar sna nga rgyal med pa la// blo gros chen po 'di bstan bya// gdug dang nad med skrag pa dang // thos med ser sna khengs rmongs pa// nga rgyal phrag dog
235b2(rgyud 'grel): yod pa dang // sngags kyi sdom pa mi shes dang // bla ma nges par mi 'dzin dang // bsam gtan dam tshig spangs pa la// 'di yi de nyid gsal byed na// dkon mchog gsum ni gis dang mtshungs// de la dngos grub
235b3(rgyud 'grel): thag ring 'gyur// sdug bsngal mang po dri la'o// shi ma thag tu dmyal bar 'gro/ de bas nam yang gsal mI bya// 'bad de man ngag bsrung bar bya// bla ma chen po mchog rnams 'di// nges pa'i rmad byung bas rmad
235b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byung // bla ma'i zhabs kyi bka' drin gyis// cung zad tsam ni bdag gsal byas// 'di yis dri med dge ba yis// khams gsum mA lus kur gyis ni// dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yi// sa ni myur du rnyed par
235b5(rgyud 'grel): shog/ dpal rin po che char yang zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po dpal shes rab gseng bas bsgyur cing gtan la phab bo//
236a1(rgyud 'grel): dpal rin chen thigs pa'i sgrub thabs bzhugs//
236b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ shrI rat+na bin+d+ha nA ma sU d+hA nr-i no pi ka/ bod skad du/ dpal rin chen thigs pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ dpal bde bya chen po la phyag 'tshalo// bde chen yan
236b2(rgyud 'grel): lcag ma dang ldan// rang nyid bde ba chen po yin// bde ba chen po'i gnas na bzhugs// he ru ka dpal bdug phyag 'tsha lA// skal ldan rnams kyi grub don du// mdor bsdus pa yi sgrub thabs bshad// dang
236b3(rgyud 'grel): bor rnal 'byor dbang phyug gis// rab tu sbyor ba 'di gnas bya// gzhung kha'i pad+ma ra yig 'bru yaM// de las rlung gi dkyil 'khor ro// gru gsum pad+mar yig 'bru raM// de las me yi dkyil 'khor// 'dzums//
236b4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang ni 'byed pa yis// rlung gis me ni bA tig par bya// b+ha gA'i pad+ma'i nang du ni// yang dag par nI 'bar ba'i me yIs lusa? kun gyi// rtag pa'i bdag nyid bsreg par bya// dwe yi 'od kyis bde 'khor lo//
236b5(rgyud 'grel): kun ni 'od du zhu bar 'gyur// 'od du zhu ba'i bdud rtsi ni// srog gi rtsa ba'i nang nas 'bab// rgyun ni mi 'chad pA yis ni// sngar tshig pa ni rab tshim bya// rang lus ye shes bdag nyid ni// mi bskyod pa yi gzu
236b6(rgyud 'grel): su mthong // oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+haHsarba d+har+m+ma swa b+hA bi shud+d+ho haM// oM shu n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM// hUM gi yig 'brus skad cig 'byung // 'khor lo dang ldan he ru bdag/ gru gsum phyag rgya dbus kyi gnas//
237a1(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma'i steng na gar dang ldan// zhal bzhi pa la phyag brgyad pa// chu skyes sngon po'i gzugs dang ldan// spyan gsum pA la g.yas brkyang ba// legs skyes dbang phyug mas ni 'khyud// thod rlon phreng
237a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i do shal can// nyi ma bye ba'i 'od dang mnyam// mi bskyod pa yi dbu la brgyan// phyag rgya drug gis yan lag brgyan// thod pa'i phreng bas dbu la brgyan// gtsug tor zla ba phyed pa can// gnag dang ser dang
237a3(rgyud 'grel): dmar dang ljang // g.yon nas bskor ba'i zhal dang ldan// 'khyud pa'i phyag ni g.yas pa na// dzI rje dang ni dril bu g.yan// nyi ma mda' dang ka b+hA la// gA yas pa yi nI phyag no bsnams// zla ba gzhu dang kha b+h+yAM
237a4(rgyud 'grel): ge/ g.yon pa yi ni phyag na bsnams// legs dgyes dbang mo de dang mthun// yang na phyag ni gnyis par dran// phyag na glu gug ka pA le// sgra smad gnyis ni 'khyud pa yin// rang las 'odra 'byung mtshig gi dngos//
237a5(rgyud 'grel): gnyisu med pa'i gnas na bzhugs// legs dgyes ma dang rdor mtsho ma// de bzhin rdo rje grong chen ma// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal dang mthun// gru gsum la ni bsgom bya ste// zhal gcig pa la spyan gsum//
237a6(rgyud 'grel): pa// zhal bzhi pa la g.yon brkyang gnas// gla rtsi gur gu ga pur gyis// bkang ba'i ka pA la rnams ni// sgeg pi'i phyag ni gnyis na thogs// gru gsum phyag rgya spyi bar bzhag/ mdzub mo gnyis na 'og tu'o//
237b1(rgyud 'grel): skra grol ba la gcer bu ste// thod rlon dro shal gyis brgyan pa// ro yi stang na 'jigs 'jigs chen// phyag rgya lnga yis an lag brgyan// la la nA sogs drag par ni// sgrub pa'i dbang pos shes par bya// de nas
237b2(rgyud 'grel): bde chen 'khor lho bzhir// pad+ma'i snod kyi nang du ni// bdud rtsi lnga yi lha yi mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid// chur yang steng naswA ye shes me// de yI 'og gi rlung dang ni// gnyisu sbyor bas mo 'brar ba//
237b3(rgyud 'grel): de yis bdud rtsi zhu byas te// rdor gsum yaM shes sa bon gyis// dkar byas rtogs byas 'bar byaso// sngags kyis byin gyis brlab kyis ni// rang lce pad+ma'i 'dab mar bzhag/ phyi nang bdag nyid can gyi gzuDa//
237b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo dwe yis ra bi tshim+b+ha byA// 'khor lo da yistA ra ba tshim byA// oM yo g+h+r-i a mr-i ta shud+d+haHsar+b+bo d+harmA yau ga a mr-i ta shud+d+ho haM// de nas mgon po'i snying po ni// thams cang+ga grub pa'i don du bzlas// oM badz+ra
237b5(rgyud 'grel): twe tse gra hri hrI hUM phaT// oM kl-i b+h+r-i dzaM l-i phaT swA hA// oM badz+ra swA gau rI hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra su ra ta hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra g+hAny+dza ri hUM phaT/ gru gsum gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ma// mchod pa'i dusu mchod pAr byaM// de nas
237b6(rgyud 'grel): gtor me sbyin par bya// sems can rnams la bsrung ba'i phyir// oM e kA ro mu kha sarba d+harmA NaM Ad+ya nut+pan+na tAta oM AHhUM phaT swA hA// de nas rnal 'byor ngal bso bya// steng dang 'og ni spangs pa yin// gnasu gting
238a1(rgyud 'grel): rings dbus su ni// rang rig shes rab ldan pa yin// drug cu rtsa bzhi 'dab ma'i nang // yang drug dri med ma skyes chu// de yi dbusu mchog gi tshul/ dri med rnam dug gnyis la khyab// rang dngos
238a2(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa de ni mthong // bskyed pa dang ni rdzogs pa med// rlabs med pa yi rang bzhin no// rlabs med pa yi sems kyis ni// mchog gi dngos po rnyed pa yin// de la cung zad blta ru med// de ni dpal me'i zhal snga
238a3(rgyud 'grel): yi// zhal gyi pad+ma mchog los ni// oMD+ya Na yul nas bdag gis rnyed// phyi nas rang gis dran don du// de yi tshig ni bris pa yin// rnal 'byor ma rnams bzod par mdzod// rin chen thigs pa zhes bya
238a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug dpal shes rab gas baus mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgyu gar skad du/ a b+hi She ka rat+na lo ka/ bod+ma skad du/ dbang rin chen
238a5(rgyud 'grel): snang pa/ dpal rdo rje sems dpral phyag 'tshalo// bcu gnyis phyed kyi phyed med pa// bcu gnyis phyed kyi phyed rang yin// bcu drug phyed phyed la phyag 'tshal// gang 'a'adi su kyang mi shes pa// gang 'di sus
238a6(rgyud 'grel): kyang gsal ma byas// rgyud rgyud na ni gsong ba bzhugs// de yi dbang mchog bdag gis bshad// dbang ma na ni myur 'grub med// rdo rje dbang phyug de skad gsung // yan lag thams cad dbang skal
238b1(rgyud 'grel): ldan// skal ldan min na nAm yang min// mkhas pas de la sbyin par bya// phyag na rdo rje de skad gsungs// thams cad mtshan gyis gang ba dang // rgyud kun thams cad shes pa dang // dbang bskur shes dang
238b2(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje che// de ni bla ma rdor rgyal nyid// bla ma 'byung de mnyes par bya// rgyud las 'byung bzhin mchod bstod bya// yon tan phung po brjod mi nus// ye shes rgya mtsho gting dpag dka'// sku ni rang bzhin dpal dang
238b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi ma 'dra// yos nyi ma bac+doMs// gzhan gyi don du khyod ni shA// 'khor bI dran pa'i dun du ni// dkyor gsal ba bdag la mdzod// do na yan lag dri zhim bskus te// gro bzang brgyan// skra ldan gyis ni lhan cig dkyor bri don du// sa la mchod pa rab tu'ang de ni bya// rin sna tso Da sa 'og gzhug cing gter du sba// dpal ni rin rgya mtsho yi// rgyud les dkying tha dad gsuM// me tog yang na du bskaM/
238b4(rgyud 'grel): yang na ting 'dzin mchog gis bya// rgyal po chom rkun 'jigs pa'i gnas// nu mu yang dkyil 'khor der mi bya// skyon ni thams cad bral ba yaM// gan su mkhas pas brtsam par bya// dang po ji tsam nus kun
238b5(rgyud 'grel): gyis// dad pas b+hU mA mchod par bya// tha ma'i zhabs la mchod byas nA// the tshom med par dngos grub tho garta dang glang po mu tIg rin tshun gser dngul dang // ras la sogs pa sna tshogs ci la dgyes pa
238b6(rgyud 'grel): dang // chung ma bu mo sring mo gzugaso na bzang ba dang // dga' ba'i yid kyis de rnams thams cad dbul bar bya// mgon po'i spyan gyis bdag la gzigs// khyod ni bdag gi ston chen po// dam tshig de
239a1(rgyud 'grel): nyid bdag la stsol// thar pa'i lam nyid bdag la stsol// pad+ma'i 'byung ba bdag la stsol// gas dra ba'i mchog ni bdag la stsol// thams cad mkhyen la phyag 'tshalo// ye shes
239a2(rgyud 'grel): nyi 'od la phyag 'tshal// thams cad mkhyen spyan phyag 'tshalo// ye shes bdud rtsi gtso phyag 'tshal// skyes bu khyod ni su zhig yin// khyod ni ci 'dod bdag la smros// dpa' bo chen+d+ra po bdag skal ldan// thog ma'i
239a3(rgyud 'grel): dbyung ni bdog la stsol// de nas de yi sna mad ri yi ras// de yi phyi ro la yon rnams dbul// rnam par snang mdzad gzugs la bsgom// dam tshig sems dpa' gzung bar bya// oM A khaM bi rA sngags kyis// me
239a4(rgyud 'grel): tog phreng ba mig dog pa ras// las kyi bum pas gtor ba bya// yang na dam tshig chu yis g+hA tor// hUM hUM phaT phaT sngags kyis ni// a ti ho brtan brtul zhugs bzang // lon gsum arka me tog gis// hUM
239a5(rgyud 'grel): phaT sngags kyis gdab par bya// de nas rdo rje me tog can// snying gar cung zad bzung bar bya// oM s+'u ra twe sa ma ya s+t+waM// de bzhin thams cad rnam par+ya gyis// yaM shes 'brasA bu tsa 'dod dang // dngos grub thamaswa ts+tshad
239a6(rgyud 'grel): rnyed par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor ma mthong sngon du ni// gang yang smra bar ma byed cig/ ma yin khyod kyi dam tshig 'di// nyams par 'gyur ba nges pa yin// de nas rdo rje spyi bor ni// gzung la 'di skad smra bar bya// 'di ni
239b1(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig rdo rje yin// spyi bor bdag gis gsor byar bya// khyod kyis gzhan la 'di smras na// skad cig gis ni phug nas 'gro/ gur gum dang ni tsan dran dang // sbrang rtsi yod pa'i chu bsres la// bdud rtsi lnga ni de
239b2(rgyud 'grel): dbus blugs// de yis dam tshig blud par bya// oM badz+rod kau ma hA dang / badz+ra ku ri bi sha na// ldan bdun bzlas pa'i sngags kyis nau// lag pa g.yasu sbyin par bya// 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu// dam tshig nyams//
239b3(rgyud 'grel): na bsreg par byed// dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub 'ong // 'thung zhig rdo rje bdud rtsi chu// di ring phan chad khyod kyis nAM/ phyag na rdo rjer bdag la smos// bdag gis ji ltar bka' stsol dka' ba sbyin// de ltar khyod/
239b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi dad pas bya dgos so// gang yang nga la mi mos nam mi bya'i// de ltar byas na rnam sman dmyal bar 'gro// skyesu dri med yid ldan pa'i// khyod kyi mig gis ji ltar mthong // dkar po dag ni mthong gyur na// zhi
239b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i las ni 'grub par 'gyur// ser po drug ni mthong gyur na// rgyas pa'i las ni 'grub par 'gyur// dmar po dag ni mthong gyur nA// dbang gi las ni 'grub par 'gyur// nag po dag ni mthong gyur na// drag po'i
239b6(rgyud 'grel): las ni 'grub par 'gyur// ras kyis mig la bkab gyur nas// rtags ni 'di dag mthong bar 'gyur// de nas bla ma rdo rje 'dzin// byin gyis brlabs ni smra bar bya// ji ltar bsod nams de bzhin 'ong // lha mo ri/
240a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi rim pa la// ji lta ba yi dngos grub yod// rang rang gi ni rigs rigs la// me tog babs pa'i bu 'di ni// de lta bu yi dngos grub 'thog/ mig dag ba ras kyi phreng ba lAs+ya// me tog
240a2(rgyud 'grel): bzang po lag tu sbyin// pra tIts+tsha ho rdo rje 'dzin// lan gsum brjod la dbul bar bgyi// bla mas me tog blta bar bya// dngos grub rab 'bring tha mA ste// yan lcag rab kyis phyag rgya tshwa'i// du sa grub the tshom med par
240a3(rgyud 'grel): mthong // yan lag 'bring gausau sngags dngos 'grub// yan lag tha mas chung dngos 'grub// rang gi lha mo'i dbus gnasu// yang na rang dang gzhan gyi bA rA// me tog gang gdan nye de'i yin// de yi gnas ni dbus su
240a4(rgyud 'grel): brlag/ dkyil 'khor phyi rol babs na ni// cung zad tsam gyi dngos grub 'od // pany+tsa re khA la babs na// phyi nas lan gsum dbul bar bya// yang ni de yi steng babs na// nam yang dngos grub thob mi 'gyur// de
240a5(rgyud 'grel): la chu yi dbang gcig sbyin// dbang gzhan dag ni mi sbyin// sgo dang rta babs phyi rol dang // rdo rje phreng ba'i phyir babs na// dngos grub tha ma'ang med gyur na// gzhan chen po ni grwa la 'grub// rdo rje se mas dpa' de ring nyid//
240a6(rgyud 'grel): khyed ni nan tan mig phye ste// bdag gis thams cad mig phye bas// rdo rje mig ni mchog gi mchog/ de nas dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i don// dang po sgo skyong la sogs nas// dkyil 'khor dza lta bu yi gnas// phyogs
240b1(rgyud 'grel): mtshams la sogs so sor bstan// bcom ldan 'das sku ji lta bur// rab gnas khrus kyi cho ga bya// de ltar slob ma la 'bad+ma// rtsa gcig gis ni khrus bya'o// bum pa chos kyi dbyings ldan pa// sangs rgyas rin
240b2(rgyud 'grel): po che yi snod// nyi zla A li kA lis 'byung // de yis nAng du bsam par bya// lha mo dang ldan mi bskyod pa// sems can zhu ba'i rang bzhin can// ye shes sems dpa' bsgom par bya// las kyi sems dpa'ang
240b3(rgyud 'grel): de yino// byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la// bla ma chen po ji ltar bya// bdag dong 'dra ba'i don du ni// na mkha'i rdo rje bdag la stsal// dbang bskur rdo rje chen po ni// khams gsum gyis ni phyag byas pa// gsang gsuM
240b4(rgyud 'grel): gzhi las 'byung ba ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag gis sbyin// oM hUM dpal ni rdo rje chus// 'khor los sgyur dbang bdag gis bskur// chu yi dbang ni bskur ba yis// mgo bor mi bsgreng+ga rigros 'byung ngo // de 'bras
240b5(rgyud 'grel): me long ye shes ni// dri med yang dag 'byung bar 'gyuraro// de nas gser sogs bzo byas dang // ya ngan ras la bri ba mchog/ 'jig rten khams ni grangs med na// sangs rgyas nyid ni bzhugs pa kun// dbu
240b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyan gzugasu bsgom pa ni// mgo bo la ni rdo rje'i gzugs// oM mu ku Ta a b+hi Shiny+tsi mi// 'khor los sgyur las khyad pa che// dbu rgyan dbang gis mgo bor ni// rin chen 'byung ldan 'byung bar 'gyur// de 'bras/
241a1(rgyud 'grel): mnyam nyid ye shes nI// d+hI myed yang dag 'byung bar 'gyur// rdo rje sgeg mos gzung nas// hUM hA d+hA ni badz+rad nas ni// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyu la dza wAr+ya// de ring bdag gis khyod dbyung
241a2(rgyud 'grel): bskur// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rab grub phyir ni rdo rje gzung // slob ma'i snying gar gtugs byas la// lag pa g.yas par sbyin par bya// oM hUM badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi// phyag na rdo rje stobs po che// rdo rje
241a3(rgyud 'grel): dbang gis mgo bor ni// snang ba mtha' 'byung bar 'gyur// de 'bras so sor rtog pa yi// ye shes gsal baR+Sha 'byung bar 'gyur// rdor dri lto sgyu 'phrul chen po 'di// gnyis med drangos po shes rab thubs
241a4(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi dbyings kyi rAng bzhin can// log pa g.yon par 'di zung shig/ 'khyud nas kun tu sbyar na su// rdo rje 'dzin 'dra'i dngos par 'dug/ aM badz+dzi a d+hi pa ti s+t+waM a b+hi Shany+tsa maM na ya kA/ dril bu'i
241a5(rgyud 'grel): dbang gis mgo bor nI// don yod grub pa 'byung bar 'gyur// de 'bras bya ba grub pa nI// dridr-i mod yang dgra 'byung bar 'gyur// rdo rje dang ni rdor dril ni// spyi bor steng du gzung byas la// oM shrI nA ma a b+hi
241a6(rgyud 'grel): Shiny+tsa mi// dngos po lnga yi rang bzhin can// kye dpal rdo rje che ge mo'o// sngar gyi rigs kyi rim blta'o// ming gi dbang gis mgo bor ro// rnam par snang mdzad rigs 'byung // ngo 'bras chos dbyings dag pa ni
241b1(rgyud 'grel): dri ma med pa 'byung bar 'gyur// 'di ni dbang bskur lnga yin t+te// ye shes lnga yI rang bzhin ts+tshana?// rigs lha'i bdag nyid kyang yin// 'byung lnga'i rang bzhin yang yin+do// dpal 'di yis ni dbang bsgyur bas/
241b2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kun la dbang byed 'gyur// yan lag lnga ni yod pa'i dbang // de ni slob dpon gyi yun no// yang na lha mo'i dbang du bstan// shes rab ma yi las yod phyir// kye yi rdo rje rgyud las gsungs// ye
241b3(rgyud 'grel): shes snying po dAr yang bston// lag pa dag gis 'khyud pa ni// bcu drug ljon pa'i shes rab 'dzin// rdo rje dril bu mnyam sbyor bA/ slob dpon dbang du gsungs pa'i gzhung // lha mo 'am ni slob dpon dbang //
241b4(rgyud 'grel): sdom pa'i mchog nI gzung nA su// sngar brjod pa yi cho ga yis// dam tshig gsum yang zhu bar bya// rdo rje slob dpon gyi ni dbyang // thugs rje'i gtAr gyis bdag l+ya stso la// bdag dang gzhan don bya
241b5(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ khyod kyi bka' drin drin gyis so// btsam ldan yang dag dpal bla mas// rdo rje de nyid gzung bar bya// hUM gi dngos po rlo rje mchog/ thog ma the ma med bdag nyid// oM mchog gi drang po skyes bu ste// rdor
241b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin thams cad bdag po ya ni// ha hAM haM hI huM hUM ste// 'di yis rdo rje byin gyis brlab// a lis rdor dril skyes pa ste// 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi ma// hUM hUM phaT phaT pheM pheM ste// 'di yis dril bu byin gyis//
242a1(rgyud 'grel): brlab// 'di ni mchog gi dngos po yin// shes rab sgyu mar gsungs pa'o// khyod kyis rtag tu bzung bar bya// thog ma byang chub rgyal bas gzung // rdo rje mchog gi ya shes ni// mi phyed na mkha'
242a2(rgyud 'grel): lta bu'i gzugs// ston pa 'di yi tshig griswa ni// slob ma'i lags tu sbyin par bya// de ni sngags ni yod pa'i sa// rtse gcig gris ni dkrol bar bya// oM AHhUM badz+ra g+haN+De ma hA na dwe swa rU pe bin du dz+nyA na mA ye hUM
242a3(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT phaT swA hA// rang yid brtan pa'i de nyid kyis// rdo rje sems dpa'o rang bzhin can// rang gi lha yi dngos po ni// sku yi phyag rgyas gsal bar bya// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi rigs// dam tshig gsuM
242a4(rgyud 'grel): ni dpa' bor gzung // de nas dkyil 'khor de nyid don// nang gi mtshan gyis sbyor ba dang // lha yi rnam dag de kho na// mtshan dang 'byung ba smra bar bya// rnam snang mdzad mgon ji lta bur// de lta bur ni slob
242a5(rgyud 'grel): ma bzung // de la gnang ba sbyin par bya// sangs rgyas tsA mdzad khyod kyis gyis// sems can thams cad phan don du// chos kyi rgyu mtsho lta bur 'dug/ tham+b+has cad ji ltar 'dul 'gyur pa'o// khyod kyis
242a6(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// 'di ni dam tshig 'dul ba yis// don gnang ba sbyin pa'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs// ye shes lnga dngos zhi ba ni// ye shes rang bzhin mi phyed la// sangs rgyas
242b1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad phyag byed pa// dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yis// nyid kyi phyag nA ji ltar bsnams// rdo rgyal brtul zhugs mi shigs pa// khyod kyis de ltar gzung bar gyiste// oM sarba ta thA ga ta naM sid+d+hi
242b2(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ya badz+ro naM// sangs rgyas gzugs ni bdag rang nyid// mchod sbyin khu tshur ldan pa yis// khyod ni bdag gis lung bstan bya// de bzhin gshegs pa rdor sems yin// sems can thar pa
242b3(rgyud 'grel): 'grub don du// ngan 'gro rnams ni dran par gyis// yang dag de bzhin gshegs pa khyod// khams gsum gyi ni thub pa khyod// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // 'phags pa rnams kyis mgrin
242b4(rgyud 'grel): gcig tu// dgra bcom pa ni yang dag pa'i// byang chub tu ni khyod lung bstan// phyag rgya chen po'i 'bras bu rA pa// 'dis gsungs pas ni khyod kyis rnyed// de nas skyabs ni// gsang ba'i sgra ni yod pa'o// 'dod chags

243a1(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems ni thang mi rung // de ni 'byung ba tsam gyis ni// sangs rgyas nyid 'gyur the tshom med// dam pa'i chos la smad mi bya// rnams kyang bor bar mi bya'o// ma rig pa 'am gti mug gis//

243a3(rgyud 'grel): mi bya'o// ji ltar bde bar bde gzung na// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma 'ongs 'byung // yan lag bzhi po 'di dag dang / gnang ba'i sbyin pa phyir mi ldog/ dbanga' ni dbang lnga zin nas ni// phyi nas 'bad de sbyin par bya//

243a6(rgyud 'grel): dbang ni brgyan du gyes pa gsungs// brtul zhugs lung bstan skyabs sbyi ni// de dag bcu gcig gcig yin no// gnyis pa la ni gsang ba'i dbang // gsum pa shes rab ye shes te/ de ltar de bzhin bzhi pa'o// yang na so sor shes
243b1(rgyud 'grel): par bya// dbang bskur 'di ni bcu bzhi pa'o// slob dpon mdun du rtse gcig gis// de nas gus pas zhu bar bya// byang chub rdo rje dpa' chen po// gsapa hrI dang ni bdag la stsol// ye shes bdud rtsi bdag la stsol//
